CrumblingDestruction.name: Crumbling Destruction
CrumblingDestruction.description: When the colossus drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage and 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FireAbsorption.name: Fire Absorption
FireAbsorption.description: Whenever the colossus is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The colossus's weapon attacks are magical.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The colossus of Akros makes two melee attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., or range 200/600 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) piercing damage, or 27 (4d8 + 9) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the colossus makes a ranged attack with this spear, the spear magically returns to its hand after the attack.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (6d8 + 9) slashing damage.

FlamesofAkros{@recharge}.name: FlamesofAkros{@recharge}
FlamesofAkros{@recharge}.description: Magical flames issue from the colossus toward up to three creatures the colossus can see within 90 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a target also magically catches fire for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the burning target repeats the saving throw. It takes 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, and the effect ends on a successful one.

AuraofErebos.name: Aura of Erebos
AuraofErebos.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the giant must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, or it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the giant's Aura of Erebos for 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

NoxiousGust{@recharge5}.name: NoxiousGust{@recharge5}
NoxiousGust{@recharge5}.description: The giant exhales a mighty gust that creates a blast of deadly mist in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

InsatiableGreed.name: Insatiable Greed
InsatiableGreed.description: The eater of hope can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The eater of hope has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eater of hope makes two attacks with its claws.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

BreathofHopelessness{@recharge5}.name: BreathofHopelessness{@recharge5}
BreathofHopelessness{@recharge5}.description: The eater of hope exhales a miasma of Underworld winds in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and is cursed for 1 minute. While cursed in this way, the target takes an extra 6 (1d12) necrotic damage whenever the eater of hope hits it with an attack. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't cursed.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

RunningLeap.name: Running Leap
RunningLeap.description: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

SpellTurning.name: Spell Turning
SpellTurning.description: The lion has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the lion (not an area). If the lion's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the lion and instead targets the caster.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lion makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

BlurredForm.name: Blurred Form
BlurredForm.description: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is incapacitated.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the eidolon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the eidolon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eidolon makes two melee attacks. Immediately before or after one of its attacks, it can use Flitterstep if it is available.

FlickeringDagger.name: FlickeringDagger
FlickeringDagger.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

Flitterstep{@recharge5}.name: Flitterstep{@recharge5}
Flitterstep{@recharge5}.description: The eidolon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. If it makes an attack immediately after teleporting, it has advantage on the attack roll.

BlurredForm.name: Blurred Form
BlurredForm.description: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is incapacitated.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eidolon makes two ghostblade attacks.

Ghostblade.name: Ghostblade
Ghostblade.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the sentinel moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

SpellTurning.name: Spell Turning
SpellTurning.description: The sentinel has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the sentinel (not an area). If the sentinel's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the sentinel and instead targets the caster.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sentinel makes two ram attacks.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: The sentinel exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The hippocamp can breathe air and water.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the hippocamp moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Reactive.name: Reactive
Reactive.description: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Hythonia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

PetrifyingGaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
PetrifyingGaze.description: When a creature that can see Hythonia's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Hythonia can force it to make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw if she isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, on a failed save the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Hythonia until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Hythonia in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If Hythonia sees herself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of her and in an area of bright light, she is affected by her own gaze.

ShedSkin(MythicTrait;RechargesafteraShor.name: Shed Skin (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
ShedSkin(MythicTrait;RechargesafteraShor.description: If Hythonia is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, she sheds her skin, regains 199 hit points, and moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hythonia makes three attacks: one with her claws, one to constrict, and one with her snaky hair.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and Hythonia can't constrict another target.

SnakyHair.name: SnakyHair
SnakyHair.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and Hythonia can pull the target up to 5 feet closer to her if it is a Large or smaller creature.

AcidicBlood.name: Acidic Blood
AcidicBlood.description: When the hydra takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of the hydra takes 9 (2d8) acid damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

MultipleHeads.name: Multiple Heads
MultipleHeads.description: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious. Whenever the hydra takes 35 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

ReactiveHeads.name: Reactive Heads
ReactiveHeads.description: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

CorpseStride.name: Corpse Stride
CorpseStride.description: Once on its turn, the lampad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one creature's corpse within its reach and emerge from a second creature's corpse within 60 feet of the first corpse, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second corpse. Both corpses must be Medium or bigger.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The lampad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lampad attacks twice with its necrotic touch or chill touch.

NecroticTouch.name: NecroticTouch
NecroticTouch.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) necrotic damage.

ChillTouch(Cantrip).name: ChillTouch(Cantrip)
ChillTouch(Cantrip).description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the lampad's next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the lampad until the end of the lampad's next turn.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the leonin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the leonin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The leonin makes three weapon attacks.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abjurer makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.

ForceBlast.name: ForceBlast
ForceBlast.description: Each creature in a 20-foot cube originating from the abjurer must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the abjurer. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

Stab.name: Stab
Stab.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Spike.name: Spike
Spike.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

AversiontoFire.name: Aversion to Fire
AversiontoFire.description: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

SulfurousImpersonation.name: Sulfurous Impersonation
SulfurousImpersonation.description: As a bonus action, the oblex can extrude a piece of itself that assumes the appearance of one Medium or smaller creature whose memories it has stolen. This simulacrum appears, feels, and sounds exactly like the creature it impersonates, though it smells faintly of sulfur. The oblex can impersonate 1d4 + 1 different creatures, each one tethered to its body by a strand of slime that can extend up to 120 feet away. For all practical purposes, the simulacrum is the oblex, meaning that the oblex occupies its space and the simulacrum's space simultaneously. The slimy tether is immune to damage, but it is severed if there is no opening at least 1 inch wide between the oblex's main body and the simulacrum. The simulacrum disappears if the tether is severed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The oblex makes one pseudopod attack and uses Eat Memories.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) psychic damage.

EatMemories.name: EatMemories
EatMemories.description: The oblex targets one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 18 (4d8) psychic damage and become memory drained until it finishes a short or long rest or until it benefits from the greater restoration or heal spell. Constructs, oozes, plants, and undead succeed on the save automatically.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

LightningStrike{@recharge}.name: LightningStrike{@recharge}
LightningStrike{@recharge}.description: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

ChillingGrasp.name: ChillingGrasp
ChillingGrasp.description: ms 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The alkilith can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the alkilith is motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary slime or fungus.

FomentMadness.name: Foment Madness
FomentMadness.description: Any creature that isn't a demon that starts its turn within 30 feet of the alkilith must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, or it hears a faint buzzing in its head for a moment and has disadvantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The alkilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The alkilith makes three tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) acid damage.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The allip can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MaddeningTouch.name: MaddeningTouch
MaddeningTouch.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

WhispersofMadness.name: WhispersofMadness
WhispersofMadness.description: The allip chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the allip's choice that the allip can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

HowlingBabble{@recharge}.name: HowlingBabble{@recharge}
HowlingBabble{@recharge}.description: Each creature within 30 feet of the allip that can hear it must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage, and it is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the amnizu's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The amnizu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The amnizu uses Poison Mind. It also makes two attacks: one with its whip and one with its Disruptive Touch.

TaskmasterWhip.name: TaskmasterWhip
TaskmasterWhip.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 33 (6d10) force damage.

DisruptiveTouch.name: DisruptiveTouch
DisruptiveTouch.description: ms 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 44 (8d10) necrotic damage.

PoisonMind.name: PoisonMind
PoisonMind.description: The amnizu targets one or two creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and is blinded until the start of the amnizu's next turn.

Forgetfulness{@recharge}.name: Forgetfulness{@recharge}
Forgetfulness{@recharge}.description: The amnizu targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. That creature must make a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw and on a failure the target is stunned for 1 minute. A stunned creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target remains stunned for the full minute, it forgets everything it sensed, experienced, and learned during the last 5 hours.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: The sorrowsworn has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

RisingAnger.name: Rising Anger
RisingAnger.description: If another creature deals damage to the sorrowsworn, the sorrowsworn's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a Hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 (3d12) psychic damage.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sorrowsworn makes two Hook attacks.

Hook.name: Hook
Hook.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The annis makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

CrushingHug.name: CrushingHug
CrushingHug.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

ChangeShape(2/Day).name: ChangeShape(2/Day)
ChangeShape(2/Day).description: The archdruid magically polymorphs into a beast or elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 9 hours. The archdruid can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The archdruid reverts to its true form if it dies or falls unconscious. The archdruid can revert to its true form using a bonus action on its turn.

Archer'sEye(3/Day).name: Archer's Eye
Archer'sEye(3/Day).description: As a bonus action, the archer can add 1d10 to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The armanite's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The armanite makes three attacks: one with its hooves, one with its claws, and one with its serrated tail.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

SerratedTail.name: SerratedTail
SerratedTail.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

LightningLance{@recharge5}.name: LightningLance{@recharge5}
LightningLance{@recharge5}.description: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

AntimagicCone.name: Antimagic Cone
AntimagicCone.description: The astral dreadnought's opened eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the dreadnought decides which way the cone faces. The cone doesn't function while the dreadnought's eye is closed or while the dreadnought is blinded.

AstralEntity.name: Astral Entity
AstralEntity.description: The astral dreadnought can't leave the Astral Plane, nor can it be banished or otherwise transported out of the Astral Plane.

DemiplanarDonjon.name: Demiplanar Donjon
DemiplanarDonjon.description: Any creature or object that the astral dreadnought swallows is transported to a demiplane that can be entered by no other means except a wish spell or this creature's Donjon Visit ability. A creature can leave the demiplane only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the plane shift spell. The demiplane resembles a stone cave roughly 1,000 feet in diameter with a ceiling 100 feet high. Like a stomach, it contains the remains of the dreadnought's past meals.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the astral dreadnought fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: An astral dreadnought's weapon attacks are magical.

SeverSilverCord.name: Sever Silver Cord
SeverSilverCord.description: If the astral dreadnought scores a critical hit against a creature traveling through the Astral Plane by means of the astral projection spell, the dreadnought can cut the target's silver cord instead of dealing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The astral dreadnought makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (5d10 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a creature of Huge size or smaller and this damage reduces it to 0 hit points or it is incapacitated, the astral dreadnought swallows it. The swallowed target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, appears in an unoccupied space on the floor of the astral dreadnought's Demiplanar Donjon.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) slashing damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the aurochs moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

EnchantingPresence.name: Enchanting Presence
EnchantingPresence.description: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.

FeyStep{@recharge4}.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
FeyStep{@recharge4}.description: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The babau makes two melee attacks. It can also use Weakening Gaze before or after making these attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

WeakeningGaze.name: WeakeningGaze
WeakeningGaze.description: The babau targets one creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Dreadful.name: Dreadful
Dreadful.description: Bael can use a bonus action to appear dreadful until the start of his next turn. Each creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Bael must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the creature's next turn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Bael fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Bael has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Bael's weapon attacks are magical.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Bael regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Bael dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Bael makes two melee attacks.

HellishMorningstar.name: HellishMorningstar
HellishMorningstar.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

InfernalCommand.name: InfernalCommand
InfernalCommand.description: Each ally of Bael's within 60 feet of him can't be charmed or frightened until the end of his next turn.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Bael magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The balhannoth makes a bite attack and up to two tentacle attacks, or it makes up to four tentacle attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

ResonantConnection.name: Resonant Connection
ResonantConnection.description: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the banderhobb can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (5d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the banderhobb can't use its bite attack or tongue attack on another target.

Tongue.name: Tongue
Tongue.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the banderhobb, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against the target.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: The banderhobb makes a bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the banderhobb and it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the banderhobb's turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stops taking necrotic damage and becomes stable.

ShadowStep.name: ShadowStep
ShadowStep.description: The banderhobb magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see. Before or after teleporting, it can make a bite or tongue attack.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If Baphomet moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

LabyrinthineRecall.name: Labyrinthine Recall
LabyrinthineRecall.description: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Baphomet's weapon attacks are magical.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of his turn, Baphomet can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Baphomet makes three attacks: one with Heartcleaver, one with his bite, and one with his gore attack.

Heartcleaver.name: Heartcleaver
Heartcleaver.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.

SongofRest.name: Song of Rest
SongofRest.description: The bard can perform a song while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra 1d6 hit points if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest. The bard can confer this benefit on itself as well.

Taunt(2/Day).name: Taunt
Taunt(2/Day).description: The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The barghest can use its action to polymorph into a Small goblin or back into its true form. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The barghest reverts to its true form if it dies.

FireBanishment.name: Fire Banishment
FireBanishment.description: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 10 feet high or wide, it must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be instantly banished to Gehenna. Instantaneous bursts of flame (such as a red dragon's breath or a fireball spell) don't have this effect on the barghest.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The barghest has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

SoulFeeding.name: Soul Feeding
SoulFeeding.description: A barghest can feed on the corpse of a humanoid that it killed that has been dead for less than 10 minutes, devouring both flesh and soul in doing so. This feeding takes at least 1 minute, and it destroys the victim's body. The victim's soul is trapped in the barghest for 24 hours, after which time it is digested. If the barghest dies before the soul is digested, the soul is released.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

SpectralDuplicate(RechargesafteraShortor.name: Spectral Duplicate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SpectralDuplicate(RechargesafteraShortor.description: As a bonus action, the berbalang creates one spectral duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. While the duplicate exists, the berbalang is unconscious. A berbalang can have only one duplicate at a time. The duplicate disappears when it or the berbalang drops to 0 hit points or when the berbalang dismisses it (no action required).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The berbalang makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

GraystaffMagic.name: Graystaff Magic
GraystaffMagic.description: The hag carries a graystaff, a length of gray wood that is a focus for her inner power. She can ride the staff as if it were a broom of flying. While holding the staff, she can cast additional spells with her Innate Spellcasting trait (these spells are marked with an asterisk). If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff.

IceWalk.name: Ice Walk
IceWalk.description: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain||3 composed of ice or snow doesn't cost her extra moment.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

MaddeningFeast.name: MaddeningFeast
MaddeningFeast.description: The hag feasts on the corpse of one enemy within 5 feet of her that died within the past minute. Each creature of the hag's choice that is within 60 feet of her and able to see her must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature is incapacitated, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish; the DM controls the creature's movement, which is erratic. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Maddening Feast for the next 24 hours.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the abishai can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abishai makes three attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its bite.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

CreepingDarkness{@recharge}.name: CreepingDarkness{@recharge}
CreepingDarkness{@recharge}.description: The abishai casts darkness at a point within 120 feet of it, requiring no components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to 60 feet as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blackguard makes three attacks with its glaive or its shortbow.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

DreadfulAspect(RechargesafteraShortorLon.name: DreadfulAspect(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

DreadfulAspect(RechargesafteraShortorLon.description: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its quarterstaff and one with its bite.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

AuraofAnnihilation.name: Aura of Annihilation
AuraofAnnihilation.description: The bodak can activate or deactivate this feature as a bonus action. While active, the aura deals 5 necrotic damage to any creature that ends its turn within 30 feet of the bodak. Undead and fiends ignore this effect.

DeathGaze.name: Death Gaze
DeathGaze.description: When a creature that can see the bodak's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the bodak, the bodak can force it to make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw if the bodak isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, unless it is immune to the frightened condition. Otherwise, a creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: The bodak takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

WitheringGaze.name: WitheringGaze
WitheringGaze.description: One creature that the bodak can see within 60 feet of it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

BoggleOil.name: Boggle Oil
BoggleOil.description: The boggle excretes nonflammable oil from its pores. The boggle chooses whether the oil is slippery or sticky and can change the oil on its skin from one consistency to another as a bonus action.

DimensionalRift.name: Dimensional Rift
DimensionalRift.description: As a bonus action, the boggle can create an invisible and immobile rift within an opening or frame it can see within 5 feet of it, provided that the space is no bigger than 10 feet on any side. The dimensional rift bridges the distance between that space and any point within 30 feet of it that the boggle can see or specify by distance and direction (such as "30 feet straight up"). While next to the rift, the boggle can see through it and is considered to be next to the destination as well, and anything the boggle puts through the rift (including a portion of its body) emerges at the destination. Only the boggle can use the rift, and it lasts until the end of the boggle's next turn.

UncannySmell.name: Uncanny Smell
UncannySmell.description: The boggle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Pummel.name: Pummel
Pummel.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

OilPuddle.name: OilPuddle
OilPuddle.description: The boggle creates a puddle of oil that is either slippery or sticky (boggle's choice). The puddle is 1 inch deep and covers the ground in the boggle's space. The puddle is difficult terrain||3 For all creatures except boggles and lasts for 1 hour.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in 1d10 hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw's master.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the boneclaw can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The boneclaw makes two claw attacks.

PiercingClaw.name: PiercingClaw
PiercingClaw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

ShadowJump.name: ShadowJump
ShadowJump.description: If the boneclaw is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the boneclaw's choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 34 (5d12 + 2) necrotic damage.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (6d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

RottingPresence.name: Rotting Presence
RottingPresence.description: When any creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet one or more bulezaus, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage plus 1 necrotic damage for each bulezau within 30 feet of it.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The bulezau's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: The bulezau has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

BarbedTail.name: BarbedTail
BarbedTail.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease ends. While poisoned in this way, the target sports festering boils, coughs up flies, and sheds rotting skin, and the target must repeat the saving throw after every 24 hours that elapse. On a successful save, the disease ends. On a failed save, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by 4 (1d8). The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cadaver collector has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SummonSpecters(RechargesafteraShortorLon.name: Summon Specters (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SummonSpecters(RechargesafteraShortorLon.description: As a bonus action, the cadaver collector calls up the enslaved spirits of those it has slain; 1d6 specter||specters (without Sunlight Sensitivity) arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of the cadaver collector. The specters act right after the cadaver collector on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the cadaver collector is destroyed.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cadaver collector makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

ParalyzingBreath{@recharge5}.name: ParalyzingBreath{@recharge5}
ParalyzingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The cadaver collector releases paralyzing gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a successful DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

DimensionalLock.name: Dimensional Lock
DimensionalLock.description: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The canoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

UncannySenses.name: Uncanny Senses
UncannySenses.description: The canoloth can't be surprised while it isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The canoloth makes two attacks: one with its tongue or its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

Tongue.name: Tongue
Tongue.description: rw 7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15), pulled up to 30 feet toward the canoloth, and is restrained until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The catoblepas has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the start of the catoblepas's next turn.

DeathRay{@recharge5}.name: DeathRay{@recharge5}
DeathRay{@recharge5}.description: The catoblepas targets a creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target instead takes 64 necrotic damage. The target dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this ray.

AdhesiveFilament.name: Adhesive Filament
AdhesiveFilament.description: The cave fisher can use its action to extend a sticky filament up to 60 feet, and the filament adheres to anything that touches it. A creature adhered to the filament is grappled by the cave fisher (escape DC 13), and ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage. The filament can be attacked (AC 15; 5 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage), but a weapon that fails to sever it becomes stuck to it, requiring an action and a successful DC 13 Strength check to pull free. Destroying the filament causes no damage to the cave fisher, which can extrude a replacement filament on its next turn

FlammableBlood.name: Flammable Blood
FlammableBlood.description: If the cave fisher drops to half its hit points or fewer, it gains vulnerability to fire damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The cave fisher can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cave fisher makes two attacks with its claws.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Filament.name: Filament
Filament.description: One creature grappled by the cave fisher's adhesive filament must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw, provided that the target weighs 200 pounds or less. On a failure, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cave fisher, and the cave fisher makes a claw attack against it as a bonus action. Reeling up the target releases anyone else who was attached to the filament. Until the grapple ends on the target, the cave fisher can't extrude another filament.

Indomitable(2/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(2/Day).description: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The chitine has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the chitine to sleep.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the chitine has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: While in contact with a web, the chitine knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The chitine ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The chitine makes three attacks with its daggers.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

AberrantQuickness(RechargesafteraShortor.name: Aberrant Quickness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
AberrantQuickness(RechargesafteraShortor.description: The choker can take an extra action on its turn.

Boneless.name: Boneless
Boneless.description: The choker can move through and occupy a space as narrow as 4 inches wide without squeezing.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The choker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The choker makes two tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the choker can't use this tentacle on another target. The choker has two tentacles. If this attack is a critical hit, the target also can't breathe or speak until the grapple ends.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The choldrith has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the choldrith to sleep.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The choldrith can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the choldrith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: While in contact with a web, the choldrith knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The choldrith ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

Web{@recharge5}.name: Web{@recharge5}
Web{@recharge5}.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 11 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 5 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

EarthArmor.name: Earth Armor
EarthArmor.description: The clockwork doesn't provoke opportunity attack||opportunity attacks when it burrows.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

LightningFlare(RechargesafteraShortorLon.name: LightningFlare(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Lightning Flare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

LightningFlare(RechargesafteraShortorLon.description: Each creature in contact with the ground within 15 feet of the clockwork must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer one random effect (roll a d6):

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The clockwork makes two Lancing Bolt attacks or one Lancing Bolt attack and one Harpoon attack.

LancingBolt.name: LancingBolt
LancingBolt.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

Harpoon.name: Harpoon
Harpoon.description: rw 7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). While grappled in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the clockwork. A creature takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. The clockwork can grapple only one creature at a time with its harpoon.

ExplosiveBolt{@recharge5}.name: ExplosiveBolt{@recharge5}
ExplosiveBolt{@recharge5}.description: The clockwork launches an explosive charge at a point within 120 feet. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked prone.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two attacks with its morningstar.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The giant magically polymorphs into a beast or humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Any equipment the giant is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The conjurer makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) force damage.

Corpses.name: Corpses
Corpses.description: When first encountered, a corpse flower contains the corpses of 1d6 + 3 humanoids. A corpse flower can hold the remains of up to nine dead humanoids. These remains have Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the corpse flower. If the corpse flower dies, the corpses within it can be pulled free.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The corpse flower can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

StenchofDeath.name: Stench of Death
StenchofDeath.description: Each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the corpse flower or one of its zombies must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, unless the creature is a construct or undead. On a failed save, the creature is incapacitated until the end of the turn. Creatures that are immune to poison damage or the poisoned condition automatically succeed on this saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the stench of all corpse flowers for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The corpse flower makes three tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage.

HarvesttheDead.name: HarvesttheDead
HarvesttheDead.description: The corpse flower grabs one unsecured dead humanoid within 10 feet of it and stuffs the corpse into itself, along with any equipment the corpse is wearing or carrying. The remains can be used with the Corpses trait.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: As a bonus action, the cranium rat can shed dim light from its brain in a 5-foot radius or extinguish the light.

TelepathicShroud.name: Telepathic Shroud
TelepathicShroud.description: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to all divination spells.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

DeathFlash.name: Death Flash
DeathFlash.description: When the darkling dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area and able to see the bright light must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.

LightSensitivity.name: Light Sensitivity
LightSensitivity.description: While in bright light, the darkling has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the darkling has advantage on the attack roll, the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

DeathBurn.name: Death Burn
DeathBurn.description: When the darkling elder dies, magical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 7 (2d6) radiant damage and, if the creature can see the light, is blinded until the end of its next turn. If the saving throw is successful, the creature takes half the damage and isn't blinded.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The darkling elder makes two melee attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the darkling elder had advantage on the attack roll, the attack deals as: extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

Darkness(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Darkness(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Darkness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Darkness(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: The darkling elder casts darkness without any components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability.

LightningBlood.name: Lightning Blood
LightningBlood.description: A creature within 5 feet of the death kiss takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage whenever it hits the death kiss with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The death kiss makes three tentacle attacks. Up to three of these attacks can be replaced by Blood Drain, one replacement per tentacle grappling a creature

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the death kiss can't use the same tentacle on another target. The death kiss has ten tentacles.

BloodDrain.name: BloodDrain
BloodDrain.description: One creature grappled by a tentacle of the death kiss must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) lightning damage, and the death kiss regains half as many hit points.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

DeathlyClaw.name: DeathlyClaw
DeathlyClaw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
