DeathlyClaw.name: DeathlyClaw
DeathlyClaw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) necrotic damage).

GraveBolts.name: GraveBolts
GraveBolts.description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one or two targets. on hit: 18 (4d8) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or become restrained as shadowy tendrils wrap around it for 1 minute. A restrained target can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wight attacks twice with Grave Bolt.

GraveBolt.name: GraveBolt
GraveBolt.description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) necrotic damage.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the roth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The deep scion can use its action to polymorph into a humanoid-piscine hybrid form, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its speed, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The deep scion reverts to its true form if it dies.

Amphibious(HybridFormOnly).name: Amphibious (Hybrid Form Only)
Amphibious(HybridFormOnly).description: The deep scion can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: In humanoid form, the deep scion makes two melee attacks. In hybrid form, the deep scion makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Battleaxe(HumanoidFormOnly).name: Battleaxe(HumanoidFormOnly)
Battleaxe(HumanoidFormOnly).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Bite(HybridFormOnly).name: Bite(HybridFormOnly)
Bite(HybridFormOnly).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Claw(HybridFormOnly).name: Claw(HybridFormOnly)
Claw(HybridFormOnly).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

PsychicScreech(HybridFormOnly;Rechargesa.name: PsychicScreech(HybridFormOnly;RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Psychic Screech (Hybrid Form Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

PsychicScreech(HybridFormOnly;Rechargesa.description: The deep scion emits a terrible scream audible within 300 feet. Creatures within 30 feet of the deep scion must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of the deep scion's next turn. In water, the psychic screech also telepathically transmits the deep scion's memories of the last 24 hours to its master, regardless of distance, so long as it and its master are in the same body of water.

value.condition: (20 ft. and swim 40 ft. in hybrid form)

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The deinonychus makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

Insanity.name: Insanity
Insanity.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

HookedShortspear.name: HookedShortspear
HookedShortspear.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the derro can choose to deal no damage and try to trip the target instead, in which case the target must succeed on a DC 9 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

LightRepeatingCrossbow.name: LightRepeatingCrossbow
LightRepeatingCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The derro savant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the derro savant has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The devourer makes two claw attacks and can use either Imprison Soul or Soul Rend.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage.

ImprisonSoul.name: ImprisonSoul
ImprisonSoul.description: The devourer chooses a living humanoid with 0 hit points that it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature is teleported inside the devourer's ribcage and imprisoned there. A creature imprisoned in this manner has disadvantage on death saving throws. If it dies while imprisoned, the devourer regains 25 hit points, immediately recharges Soul Rend, and gains an additional action on its next turn. Additionally, at the start of its next turn, the devourer regurgitates the slain creature as a bonus action, and the creature becomes an undead. If the victim had 2 or fewer Hit Dice, it becomes a zombie. if it had 3 to 5 Hit Dice, it becomes a ghoul. Otherwise, it becomes a wight. A devourer can imprison only one creature at a time.

SoulRend{@recharge}.name: SoulRend{@recharge}
SoulRend{@recharge}.description: The devourer creates a vortex of life-draining energy in a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each humanoid in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Increase the damage by 10 for each living humanoid with 0 hit points in that area.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The dhergoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dhergoloth makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

FlailingClaws{@recharge5}.name: FlailingClaws{@recharge5}
FlailingClaws{@recharge5}.description: The dhergoloth moves up to its walking speed in a straight line and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (3d12 + 3) slashing damage.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The dhergoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

KeenSenses.name: Keen Senses
KeenSenses.description: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell or sight.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The troll dies only if it is hit by an attack that deals 10 or more acid or fire damage while the troll has 0 hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troll makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

WhirlwindofClaws{@recharge5}.name: WhirlwindofClaws{@recharge5}
WhirlwindofClaws{@recharge5}.description: Each creature within 10 feet of the troll must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The diviner makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) radiant damage.

OverwhelmingRevelation{@recharge5}.name: OverwhelmingRevelation{@recharge5}
OverwhelmingRevelation{@recharge5}.description: The diviner magically creates a burst of illumination in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of the diviner's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the dolphin moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The dolphin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The dolphin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dolphin makes two Dazzling Slam attacks.

DazzlingSlam.name: DazzlingSlam
DazzlingSlam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the dolphin's next turn.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The draegloth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draegloth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

ChangeShape(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
ChangeShape(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.description: The drow can use a bonus action to magically polymorph into a giant spider, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It can speak and cast spells while in giant spider form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying in humanoid form melds into the giant spider form. It can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment. It reverts to its humanoid form if it dies.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The drow can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The drow ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drow makes two poisonous touch attacks or two bite attacks. The first of these attacks that hits each round deals an extra 26 (4d12) poison damage to the target.

PoisonousTouch(HumanoidFormOnly).name: PoisonousTouch(HumanoidFormOnly)
PoisonousTouch(HumanoidFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (8d6) poison damage.

Bite(GiantSpiderFormOnly).name: Bite(GiantSpiderFormOnly)
Bite(GiantSpiderFormOnly).description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 26 (4d12) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

Web(GiantSpiderFormOnlyRecharge56).name: Web(GiantSpiderFormOnlyRecharge56)
Web(GiantSpiderFormOnlyRecharge56).description: rw 8 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. on hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 15 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

WarMagic.name: War Magic
WarMagic.description: When the drow uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drow makes three scimitar attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage. In addition, the target has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell the drow casts before the end of the drow's next turn.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 11 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

BattleCommand.name: Battle Command
BattleCommand.description: As a bonus action, the drow targets one ally he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see or hear the drow, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the Dodge or Hide action.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drow makes three attacks: two with his scimitar and one with his whip or his hand crossbow.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

Whip.name: Whip
Whip.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is an ally, it has advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

DiscernLie.name: Discern Lie
DiscernLie.description: The drow knows when she hears a creature speak a lie in a language she knows.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drow makes three death lance attacks.

DeathLance.name: DeathLance
DeathLance.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage it takes. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

Lolth'sFickleFavor.name: Lolth's Fickle Favor
Lolth'sFickleFavor.description: As a bonus action, the matron can bestow the Spider Queen's blessing on one ally she can see within 30 feet of her. The ally takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage but has advantage on the next attack roll it makes until the end of its next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The matron mother makes two demon staff attacks or three tentacle rod attacks.

DemonStaff.name: DemonStaff
DemonStaff.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage. In addition, the target must succeed on a DC19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the drow for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

TentacleRod.name: TentacleRod
TentacleRod.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is hit three times by the rod on one turn, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or suffer the following effects for 1 minute: the target's speed is halved, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions. Moreover, on each of its turns, it can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SummonServant(1/Day).name: SummonServant(1/Day)
SummonServant(1/Day).description: The drow magically summons a retriever|mtf or a yochlol. The summoned creature appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

ShadowStep.name: Shadow Step
ShadowStep.description: While in dim light or darkness, the drow can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drow makes two attacks with its shadow sword. If either attack hits and the target is within 10 feet of a 5-foot cube of darkness created by the shadow sword on a previous turn, the drow can dismiss that darkness and cause the target to take 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. The drow can dismiss darkness in this way no more than once per turn.

ShadowSword.name: ShadowSword
ShadowSword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and 10 (3d6) poison damage. The drow can then fill an unoccupied 5-foot cube within 5 feet of the target with magical darkness, which remains for 1 minute.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 9 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PsychicEngine.name: Psychic Engine
PsychicEngine.description: When the duergar despot suffers a critical hit or is reduced to 0 hit points, psychic energy erupts from its frame to deal 14 (4d6) psychic damage to each creature within 5 feet of it.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar despot has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The despot makes two iron fist attacks and two stomping foot attacks. It can replace up to four of these attacks with uses of its Flame Jet.

IronFist.name: IronFist
IronFist.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must make a successful DC 17 Strength saving throw or be thrown up to 30 feet away in a straight line. The target is knocked prone and then takes 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage.

StompingFoot.name: StompingFoot
StompingFoot.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage, or 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage to a prone target.

FlameJet.name: FlameJet
FlameJet.description: The duergar spews flames in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

EngineofPain.name: Engine of Pain
EngineofPain.description: Once per turn, a creature that attacks the hammerer can target the duergar trapped in it. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 5 (1d10) damage to the hammerer, and the hammerer can respond by using its Multiattack with its reaction.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The hammerer deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hammerer makes two attacks: one with its claw and one with its hammer.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

CavalryTraining.name: Cavalry Training
CavalryTraining.description: When the duergar hits a target with a melee attack while mounted on a female steeder, the steeder can make one melee attack against the same target as a reaction.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The duergar makes two war pick attacks.

WarPick.name: WarPick
WarPick.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

SharedInvisibility(RechargesafteraShorto.name: SharedInvisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Shared Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SharedInvisibility(RechargesafteraShorto.description: The duergar magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, or its concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it. While the invisible duergar is mounted on a female steeder, the steeder is invisible as well. The invisibility ends early on the steeder immediately after it attacks.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The duergar makes two melee attacks. It can replace one of those attacks with a use of Mind Mastery.

Mind-PoisonDagger.name: Mind-PoisonDagger
Mind-PoisonDagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage and 10 (3d6) psychic damage, or 1 piercing damage and 14 (4d6) psychic damage while reduced.

Invisibility{@recharge4}.name: Invisibility{@recharge4}
Invisibility{@recharge4}.description: The duergar magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Reduce, or its concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

MindMastery.name: MindMastery
MindMastery.description: The duergar targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw, or the duergar causes it to use its reaction either to make one weapon attack against another creature the duergar can see or to move up to 10 feet in a direction of the duergar's choice. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this effect.

Reduce(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Reduce(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Reduce (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Reduce(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, the duergar magically decreases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While reduced, the duergar is Tiny, reduces its weapon damage to 1, and makes attacks, checks, and saving throws with disadvantage if they use Strength. It gains a +5 bonus to all Dexterity (Stealth) checks and a +5 bonus to its AC. It can also take a bonus action on each of its turns to take the Hide action.

EngineofPain.name: Engine of Pain
EngineofPain.description: Once per turn, a creature that attacks the screamer can target the duergar trapped in it. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) damage to the screamer, and the screamer can respond by using its Multiattack with its reaction.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The screamer makes one drill attack and uses its Sonic Scream.

Drill.name: Drill
Drill.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.

SonicScream.name: SonicScream
SonicScream.description: The screamer emits destructive energy in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) thunder damage and be knocked prone.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

CreateSoulblade.name: Create Soulblade
CreateSoulblade.description: As a bonus action, the duergar can create a shortsword-sized, visible blade of psionic energy. The weapon appears in the duergar's hand and vanishes if it leaves the duergar's grip, or if the duergar dies or is incapacitated.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Soulblade.name: Soulblade
Soulblade.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage, or 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage while enlarged. If the soulblade has advantage on the attack roll, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) force damage.

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: The duergar magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

PhalanxFormation.name: Phalanx Formation
PhalanxFormation.description: The duergar has advantage on attack rolls and Dexterity saving throws while standing within 5 feet of a duergar ally wielding a shield.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

King'sKnife(Shortsword).name: King'sKnife(Shortsword)
King'sKnife(Shortsword).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage while enlarged.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage while enlarged.

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The duergar makes three hammer or javelin attacks and uses Call to Attack, or Enlarge if it is available.

Psychic-AttunedHammer.name: Psychic-AttunedHammer
Psychic-AttunedHammer.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) psychic damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) psychic damage while enlarged,

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage while enlarged.

CalltoAttack.name: CalltoAttack
CalltoAttack.description: Up to three allied duergar within 120 feet of this duergar that can hear it can each use their reaction to make one weapon attack.

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

FireLance.name: FireLance
FireLance.description: mw 5 to hit (with disadvantage if the target is within 5 feet of the duergar), reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage, or 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage while enlarged.

FireSpray{@recharge5}.name: FireSpray{@recharge5}
FireSpray{@recharge5}.description: From its fire lance, the duergar shoots a 15-foot cone of fire or a line of fire 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: The duergar magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The dybbuk can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dybbuk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ViolateCorpse.name: Violate Corpse
ViolateCorpse.description: The dybbuk can use a bonus action while it is possessing a corpse to make it do something unnatural, such as vomit blood, twist its head all the way around, or cause a quadruped to move as a biped. Any beast or humanoid that sees this behavior must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this ability is immune to Violate Corpse for 24 hours.

Tendril.name: Tendril
Tendril.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its hit point maximum is also reduced by 3 (1d6). This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

PossessCorpse{@recharge}.name: PossessCorpse{@recharge}
PossessCorpse{@recharge}.description: The dybbuk disappears into an intact corpse it can see within 5 feet of it. The corpse must be Large or smaller and be that of a beast or a humanoid. The dybbuk is now effectively the possessed creature. Its type becomes undead, though it now looks alive, and it gains a number of temporary hit points equal to the corpse's hit point maximum in life.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

ThunderousStrike{@recharge}.name: ThunderousStrike{@recharge}
ThunderousStrike{@recharge}.description: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object other than a sacred statue.

SacredAnimation{@recharge5}.name: Sacred Animation {@recharge 5}
SacredAnimation{@recharge5}.description: When the eidolon moves into a space occupied by a sacred statue, the eidolon can disappear, causing the statue to become a creature under the eidolon's control. The eidolon uses the sacred statue|mtf's statistics in place of its own.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

DivineDread.name: DivineDread
DivineDread.description: Each creature within 60 feet of the eidolon that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the creature must take the Dash action and move away from the eidolon by the safest available route at the start of each of its turns, unless there is nowhere for it to move, in which case the creature also becomes stunned until it can move again. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any eidolon's Divine Dread for the next 24 hours.

CreatureSense.name: Creature Sense
CreatureSense.description: The elder brain is aware of the presence of creatures within 5 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each one's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the elder brain fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The elder brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

TelepathicHub.name: Telepathic Hub
TelepathicHub.description: The elder brain can use its telepathy to initiate and maintain telepathic conversations with up to ten creatures at a time. The elder brain can let those creatures telepathically hear each other while connected in this way.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (4d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15) and takes 9 (1d8 + 5) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The elder brain can have up to four targets grappled at a time.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The elder brain magically emits psychic energy. Creatures of the elder brain's choice within 60 feet of it must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

PsychicLink.name: PsychicLink
PsychicLink.description: The elder brain targets one incapacitated creature it can perceive with its Creature Sense trait and establishes a psychic link with that creature. Until the psychic link ends, the elder brain can perceive everything the target senses. The target becomes aware that something is linked to its mind once it is no longer incapacitated, and the elder brain can terminate the link at any time (no action required). The target can use an action on its turn to attempt to break the psychic link, doing so with a successful DC 18 Charisma saving throw. On a successful save, the target takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage. The psychic link also ends if the target and the elder brain are more than 5 miles apart, with no consequences to the target. The elder brain can form psychic links with up to ten creatures at a time.

SenseThoughts.name: SenseThoughts
SenseThoughts.description: The elder brain targets a creature with which it has a psychic link. The elder brain gains insight into the target's reasoning, its emotional state, and thoughts that loom large in its mind (including things the target worries about, loves, or hates). The elder brain can also make a Charisma (Deception) check with advantage to deceive the target's mind into thinking it believes one idea or feels a particular emotion. The target contests this attempt with a Wisdom (Insight) check. If the elder brain succeeds, the mind believes the deception for 1 hour or until evidence of the lie is presented to the target.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

AversiontoFire.name: Aversion to Fire
AversiontoFire.description: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

SulfurousImpersonation.name: Sulfurous Impersonation
SulfurousImpersonation.description: As a bonus action, the oblex can extrude a piece of itself that assumes the appearance of one Medium or smaller creature whose memories it has stolen. This simulacrum appears, feels, and sounds exactly like the creature it impersonates, though it smells faintly of sulfur. The oblex can impersonate 2d6 + 1 different creatures, each one tethered to its body by a strand of slime that can extend up to 120 feet away. For all practical purposes, the simulacrum is the oblex, meaning the oblex occupies its space and the simulacrum's space simultaneously. The slimy tether is immune to damage, but it is severed if there is no opening at least 1 inch wide between the oblex's main body and the simulacrum. The simulacrum disappears if the tether is severed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The elder oblex makes two pseudopod attacks and uses Eat Memories.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

EatMemories.name: EatMemories
EatMemories.description: The oblex targets one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or take 44 (8d10) psychic damage and become memory drained until it finishes a short or long rest or until it benefits from the greater restoration or heal spell. Constructs, oozes, plants, and undead succeed on the save automatically.

AirForm.name: Air Form
AirForm.description: The tempest can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The tempest doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the tempest fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

LivingStorm.name: Living Storm
LivingStorm.description: The tempest is always at the center of a storm 1d6 + 4 miles in diameter. Heavy precipitation in the form of either rain or snow falls there, causing the area to be lightly obscured. Heavy rain also extinguishes open flames and imposes disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The tempest deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tempest makes two attacks with its thunderous slam.

ThunderousSlam.name: ThunderousSlam
ThunderousSlam.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) thunder damage.

LightningStorm{@recharge}.name: LightningStorm{@recharge}
LightningStorm{@recharge}.description: All other creatures within 120 feet of the tempest must each make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also stunned until the end of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The enchanter makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The evoker makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) force damage.

SculptedExplosion{@recharge4}.name: SculptedExplosion{@recharge4}
SculptedExplosion{@recharge4}.description: The evoker unleashes a magical explosion of a particular damage type: cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. The magic erupts in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 150 feet of the evoker. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. The evoker can select up to three creatures it can see in the area to ignore the spell, as the evoker sculpts the spell's energy around them. On a failed save, a creature takes 40 (9d8) damage of the chosen type and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

ExtraordinaryLeap.name: Extraordinary Leap
ExtraordinaryLeap.description: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to move 3 feet.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

StickyLeg.name: StickyLeg
StickyLeg.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. on hit: The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and is grappled until it escapes (escape DC 12). The steeder can have only one creature grappled at a time.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

WaterSusceptibility.name: Water Susceptibility
WaterSusceptibility.description: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in 1 foot or more of water, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The myrmidon makes three scimitar attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

FieryStrikes{@recharge}.name: FieryStrikes{@recharge}
FieryStrikes{@recharge}.description: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) fire damage.

DualShields.name: Dual Shields
DualShields.description: The giant carries two shields, each of which is accounted for in the giant's AC. The giant must stow or drop one of its shields to hurl rocks.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two fireshield attacks.

Fireshield.name: Fireshield
Fireshield.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

ShieldCharge.name: ShieldCharge
ShieldCharge.description: The giant moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, it makes a fireshield attack against that creature. If the attack hits, the target must also succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed ahead of the giant for the rest of this move. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is also knocked prone and takes 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 29 (6d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage if it was already prone.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

Imix'sBlessing.name: Imix's Blessing
Imix'sBlessing.description: When the firenewt reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the firenewt gains 5 temporary hit points.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The firenewt makes two attacks with its scimitar.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

SpitFire(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: SpitFire(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Spit Fire (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SpitFire(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: The firenewt spits fire at a creature within 10 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one

AntimagicShell.name: Antimagic Shell
AntimagicShell.description: The snail has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature making a spell attack against the snail has disadvantage on the attack roll. If the snail succeeds on its saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses it, an additional effect might occur, as determined by rolling a d6:

FlailTentacles.name: Flail Tentacles
FlailTentacles.description: The flail snail has five flail tentacles. Whenever the snail takes 10 damage or more on a single turn, one of its tentacles dies. If even one tentacle remains, the snail regrows all dead ones within 1d4 days. If all its tentacles die, the snail retracts into its shell, gaining Cover||3||total cover, and it begins wailing, a sound that can be heard for 600 feet, stopping only when it dies 5d6 minutes later. Healing magic that restores limbs, such as the regenerate spell, can halt this dying process.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The flail snail makes as many flail tentacle attacks as it has flail tentacles, all against the same target.

FlailTentacle.name: FlailTentacle
FlailTentacle.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

ScintillatingShell(RechargesafteraShorto.name: ScintillatingShell(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Scintillating Shell (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

ScintillatingShell(RechargesafteraShorto.description: The snail's shell emits dazzling, colored light until the end of the snail's next turn. During this time, the shell sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet, and creatures that can see the snail have disadvantage on attack rolls against it. In addition, any creature within the bright light and able to see the snail when this power is activated must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the light ends.

ShellDefense.name: ShellDefense
ShellDefense.description: The flail snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to AC until it emerges. It can emerge from its shell as a bonus action on its turn.

AuraofBloodThirst.name: Aura of Blood Thirst
AuraofBloodThirst.description: If the flind isn't incapacitated, any creature with the Rampage trait can make a bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The flind makes three attacks: one with each of its different flail attacks or three with its longbow.

FlailofMadness.name: FlailofMadness
FlailofMadness.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must make a melee attack against a random target within its reach on its next turn. If it has no targets within its reach even after moving, it loses its action on that turn.

FlailofPain.name: FlailofPain
FlailofPain.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 22 (4d10) psychic damage.

FlailofParalysis.name: FlailofParalysis
FlailofParalysis.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Fraz-Urb'luu's weapon attacks are magical.

Undetectable.name: Undetectable
Undetectable.description: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The froghemoth can breathe air and water.

ShockSusceptibility.name: Shock Susceptibility
ShockSusceptibility.description: If the froghemoth takes lightning damage, it suffers several effects until the end of its next turn: its speed is halved, it takes a 2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, it can't use reactions or Multiattack, and on its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The froghemoth makes two attacks with its tentacles. It can also use its tongue or bite.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the froghemoth can't use this tentacle on another target. The froghemoth has four tentacles.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage, and the target is swallowed if it is a Medium or smaller creature. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the froghemoth, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the froghemoth's turns.

Tongue.name: Tongue
Tongue.description: The Froghemoth targets one Medium or smaller creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the froghemoth, and the froghemoth can make a bite attack against it as a bonus action.

ExtraHeads.name: Extra Heads
ExtraHeads.description: The giant has a 25 chance of having more than one head. If it has more than one, it has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The giant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the giant takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The giant dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Vaprak'sRage(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Vaprak's Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Vaprak'sRage(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: As a bonus action, the giant can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the giant is incapacitated. While raging, the giant gains the following benefits:

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two attacks with its greataxe.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) slashing damage, or 30 (3d12 + 11) slashing damage while raging.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

BurningFury.name: Burning Fury
BurningFury.description: When the salamander takes fire damage, its Freezing Breath automatically recharges.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The salamander makes five attacks: four with its claws and one with its bite.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage and 5 (1d10) cold damage.

FreezingBreath{@recharge}.name: FreezingBreath{@recharge}
FreezingBreath{@recharge}.description: The salamander exhales chill wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

StunningGaze.name: Stunning Gaze
StunningGaze.description: When a creature that can see the gauth's central eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the gauth, the gauth can force it to make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw if the gauth isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. A creature that fails the save is stunned until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the gauth in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the gauth dies, the magical energy within it explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

EyeRays.name: EyeRays
EyeRays.description: The gauth shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the gazer can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The gazer can mimic simple sounds of speech it has heard, in any language. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

EyeRays.name: EyeRays
EyeRays.description: The gazer shoots two of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one or two targets it can see within 60 feet of it:

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Geryon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Geryon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Geryon's weapon attacks are magical.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Geryon regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Geryon dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Geryon makes two attacks: one with his claws and one with his stinger.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (DC 24) and is restrained until the grapple ends. Geryon can grapple one creature at a time. If the target is already grappled by Geryon, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) slashing damage.

Stinger.name: Stinger
Stinger.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (2d4 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage and become poisoned until it finishes a short or long rest. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the poison damage it takes. If its hit point maximum drops to 0, it dies. This reduction lasts until the poisoned condition is removed.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Geryon magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

FireAbsorption.name: Fire Absorption
FireAbsorption.description: Whenever the giant strider is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

FireBurst{@recharge5}.name: FireBurst{@recharge5}
FireBurst{@recharge5}.description: The giant strider hurls a gout of flame at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners, and it ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried.

HeadfirstCharge.name: Headfirst Charge
HeadfirstCharge.description: The giff can try to knock a creature over; if the giff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line that ends within 5 feet of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

FirearmsKnowledge.name: Firearms Knowledge
FirearmsKnowledge.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of muskets and pistols.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giff makes two pistol attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Musket.name: Musket
Musket.description: rw 4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

FragmentationGrenade(1/Day).name: FragmentationGrenade(1/Day)
FragmentationGrenade(1/Day).description: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet. Each creature within 20 feet of the grenade's detonation must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit. reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

WarMagic.name: War Magic
WarMagic.description: When the githyanki uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githyanki makes two longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

RallytheTroops.name: Rally the Troops
RallytheTroops.description: As a bonus action, the githyanki can magically end the charmed and frightened conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githyanki makes three greatsword attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks.

SilverGreatsword.name: SilverGreatsword
SilverGreatsword.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) psychic damage. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the astral projection spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

PsychicDefense.name: Psychic Defense
PsychicDefense.description: While the anarch is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The anarch makes three unarmed strikes.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

PsychicDefense.name: Psychic Defense
PsychicDefense.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githzerai makes three unarmed strikes.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

TemporalStrike{@recharge}.name: TemporalStrike{@recharge}
TemporalStrike{@recharge}.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 52 (8d12) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or move 1 round forward in time. A target moved forward in time vanishes for the duration. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in an unoccupied space nearest to that space if it's occupied.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gnoll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its shortsword.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SuddenRush.name: SuddenRush
SuddenRush.description: Until the end of the turn, the gnoll's speed increases by 60 feet and it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gnoll makes two melee attacks with its spear or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

Bite.name: Bite

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When the witherling reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The witherling makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its club, or two with its club.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gray render makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is prone an additional 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage is dealt to the target.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: Graz'zt can use his action to polymorph into a form that resembles a Medium humanoid, or back into his true form. Aside from his size, his statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Graz'zt fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Graz'zt has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Graz'zt's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Graz'zt attacks twice with Wave of Sorrow.

WaveofSorrow(Greatsword).name: WaveofSorrow(Greatsword)
WaveofSorrow(Greatsword).description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Graz'zt magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abishai makes two attacks, one with its claws and one with its longsword, or it casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait and makes one claw attack.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The grung can breathe air and water.

PoisonousSkin.name: Poisonous Skin
PoisonousSkin.description: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung's skin must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The grung's long jump is up to 25 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow

MesmerizingChirr{@recharge}.description: The grung makes a chirring noise to which grungs are immune. Each humanoid or beast that is within 15 feet of the grung and able to hear it must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of the grung's next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The grung can breathe air and water.

PoisonousSkin.description: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung's skin must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The guard drake makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The hellfire engine is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hellfire engine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Flesh-CrushingStride.name: Flesh-CrushingStride
Flesh-CrushingStride.description: The hellfire engine moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the hellfire engine enters must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed to the nearest space out of the hellfire engine's path. On a failed save, the creature falls prone and takes 28 (8d6) bludgeoning damage.

HellfireWeapons.name: HellfireWeapons
HellfireWeapons.description: The hellfire engine uses one of the following options:

ArcaneAdvantage.name: Arcane Advantage
ArcaneAdvantage.description: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't incapacitated.

ArmyArcana.name: Army Arcana
ArmyArcana.description: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hobgoblin makes four attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack. It can also use Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Dart.name: Dart
