Dart.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

ShadowJaunt.name: ShadowJaunt
ShadowJaunt.description: The hobgoblin magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it is leaving and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: A howler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The howler makes two bite attacks.

RendingBite.name: RendingBite
RendingBite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is frightened it takes an additional 22 (4d10) psychic damage. This attack ignores damage resistance.

Mind-BreakingHowl{@recharge}.name: Mind-BreakingHowl{@recharge}
Mind-BreakingHowl{@recharge}.description: The howler emits a keening howl in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area that isn't deafened must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the howler's next turn. While a creature is frightened in this way, its speed is halved, and it is incapacitated. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Mind-Breaking Howl of all howlers for the next 24 hours.

LifeHunger.name: Life Hunger
LifeHunger.description: If a creature within 60 feet of the sorrowsworn regains hit points, the sorrowsworn gains two benefits until the end of its next turn: it has advantage on attack rolls, and its Bite deals an extra 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a hit.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sorrowsworn makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 16), and it is restrained until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the sorrowsworn can't make a Claw attack.

InfernalDespair.name: Infernal Despair
InfernalDespair.description: Each creature within 15 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Hutijin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Hutijin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Hutijin's weapon attacks are magical.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Hutijin regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hutijin makes four attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, one with his mace, and one with his tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Hutijin magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The hydroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

SecureMemory.name: Secure Memory
SecureMemory.description: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

WateryAdvantage.name: Watery Advantage
WateryAdvantage.description: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hydroloth makes two melee attacks. In place of one of these attacks, it can cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

StealMemory(1/Day).name: StealMemory(1/Day)
StealMemory(1/Day).description: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes 4d6 psychic damage, and it must make a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target loses all proficiencies, it can't cast spells, it can't understand language, and if its Intelligence and Charisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A greater restoration or remove curse spell cast on the target ends this effect early.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The hydroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The illusionist makes two Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage.

Foul.name: Foul
Foul.description: Any creature, other than an ooze, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Juiblex must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Juiblex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Juiblex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Juiblex's weapon attacks are magical.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Juiblex regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Juiblex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Juiblex can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Juiblex makes three acid lash attacks.

AcidLash.name: AcidLash
AcidLash.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) acid damage. Any creature killed by this attack is drawn into Juiblex's body, and the corpse is obliterated after 1 minute.

EjectSlime{@recharge5}.name: EjectSlime{@recharge5}
EjectSlime{@recharge5}.description: Juiblex spews out a corrosive slime, targeting one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 55 (10d10) acid damage. Unless the target avoids taking any of this damage, any metal armor worn by the target takes a permanent 1 penalty to the AC it offers, and any metal weapon it is carrying or wearing takes a permanent 1 penalty to damage rolls. The penalty worsens each time a target is subjected to this effect. If the penalty on an object drops to 5, the object is destroyed.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the ki-rin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The ki-rin's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ki-rin makes three attacks: two with its hooves and one with its horn.

Hoof.name: Hoof
Hoof.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Horn.name: Horn
Horn.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Dragon'sResistance.name: Dragon's Resistance
Dragon'sResistance.description: The kobold has resistance to a type of damage based on the color of dragon that invested it with power (choose or roll a d10): 12, acid (black); 34, cold (white); 56, fire (red); 78, lightning (blue); 910, poison (green).

HeartoftheDragon.name: Heart of the Dragon
HeartoftheDragon.description: If the kobold is frightened or paralyzed by an effect that allows a saving throw, it can repeat the save at the start of its turn to end the effect on itself and all kobolds within 30 feet of it. Any kobold that benefits from this trait (including the dragonshield) has advantage on its next attack roll.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kobold makes two melee attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

WeaponInvention.name: WeaponInvention
WeaponInvention.description: The kobold uses one of the following options (roll a d8 or choose one); the kobold can use each one no more than once per day:

SorceryPoints.name: Sorcery Points
SorceryPoints.description: The kobold has 3 sorcery points. It regains all its spent sorcery points when it finishes a long rest. It can spend its sorcery points on the following options:

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature it at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

CommandHair.name: Command Hair
CommandHair.description: The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or become grappled by the rope (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends. the target is restrained. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes incapacitated.

StoneCamouflage.name: Stone Camouflage
StoneCamouflage.description: The korred has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Stone'sStrength.name: Stone's Strength
Stone'sStrength.description: While on the ground, the korred deals 2 extra dice of damage with any weapon attack (included in its attacks).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The korred makes two attacks with its greatclub or hurls two rocks.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The priest can breathe air and water.

ThunderousTouch.name: ThunderousTouch
ThunderousTouch.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 27 (5d10) thunder damage.

VoiceoftheKraken(RechargesafteraShortorL.name: VoiceoftheKraken(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Voice of the Kraken (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

VoiceoftheKraken(RechargesafteraShortorL.description: A kraken speaks through the priest with a thunderous voice audible within 300 feet. Creatures of the priest's choice that can hear the kraken's words (which are spoken in Abyssal, Infernal, or Primordial) must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

Stab.name: Stab
Stab.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

Spike.name: Spike
Spike.description: rw 6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

AcidSpray{@recharge5}.name: AcidSpray{@recharge5}
AcidSpray{@recharge5}.description: The kruthik sprays acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The leucrotta has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

KickingRetreat.name: Kicking Retreat
KickingRetreat.description: If the leucrotta attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When the leucrotta reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make an attack with its hooves.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The leucrotta makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its hooves.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the leucrotta scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

PartialFreeze.name: Partial Freeze
PartialFreeze.description: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Tidal Wave).

WaterForm.name: Water Form
WaterForm.description: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The leviathan makes two attacks: one with its slam and one with its tail.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (1d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) acid damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (1d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 6 (1d12) acid damage.

TidalWave{@recharge}.name: TidalWave{@recharge}
TidalWave{@recharge}.description: While submerged, the leviathan magically creates a wall of water centered on itself. The wall is up 250 feet long, up to 250 feet high, and up to 50 feet thick. When the wall appears, all other creatures within its area must each make a DC 24 Strength saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

PsychicLeech.name: Psychic Leech
PsychicLeech.description: At the start of each of the sorrowsworn's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

ThrivesonCompany.name: Thrives on Company
ThrivesonCompany.description: The sorrowsworn has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sorrowsworn makes one Harpoon Arm attack, and it uses Sorrowful Embrace.

HarpoonArm.name: HarpoonArm
HarpoonArm.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The sorrowsworn has two harpoon arms and can grapple up to two creatures at once.

SorrowfulEmbrace.name: SorrowfulEmbrace
SorrowfulEmbrace.description: Each creature grappled by the sorrowsworn must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In either case, the sorrowsworn pulls each of those creatures up to 30 feet straight toward it.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sorrowsworn makes two Arm Spike attacks.

ArmSpike.name: ArmSpike
ArmSpike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Embrace{@recharge4}.name: Embrace{@recharge4}
Embrace{@recharge4}.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is frightened, and it takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The sorrowsworn can grapple only one creature at a time.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

ExtraordinaryLeap.name: Extraordinary Leap
ExtraordinaryLeap.description: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to jump 3 feet.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

StickyLeg.name: StickyLeg
StickyLeg.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. on hit: The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and is grappled until it escapes (escape DC 12). The steeder can have only one creature grappled at a time.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The marut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the marut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The marut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The marut makes two slam attacks.

UnerringSlam.name: UnerringSlam
UnerringSlam.description: mw automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 60 force damage, and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away from the marut if it is Huge or smaller.

BlazingEdict{@recharge5}.name: BlazingEdict{@recharge5}
BlazingEdict{@recharge5}.description: Arcane energy emanates from the marut's chest in a 60-foot cube. Every creature in that area takes 45 radiant damage. Each creature that takes any of this damage must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of the marut's next turn.

Justify.name: Justify
Justify.description: The marut targets up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or be teleported to a teleportation circle in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil. A target fails automatically if it is incapacitated. If either target is teleported in this way, the marut teleports with it to the circle.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of its turns, the thief can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: The thief deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn't incapacitated and the thief doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thief makes three attacks with its shortsword.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

AssumeForm.name: Assume Form
AssumeForm.description: The maurezhi can assume the appearance of any Medium humanoid it has eaten. It remains in this form for 1d6 days, during which time the form gradually decays until, when the effect ends, the form sloughs from the demon's body.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The maurezhi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The maurezhi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, its Charisma score is reduced by 1d4. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this reduces its Charisma to 0. It rises 24 hours later as a ghoul, unless it has been revived or its corpse has been destroyed.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

RaiseGhoul{@recharge5}.name: RaiseGhoul{@recharge5}
RaiseGhoul{@recharge5}.description: The maurezhi targets one dead ghoul or ghast it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is revived with all its hit points.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the maw demon can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the meazel can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Garrote.name: Garrote
Garrote.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target of the meazel's size or smaller. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13 with disadvantage). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the meazel's turns. The meazel can't make weapon attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

ShadowTeleport{@recharge5}.name: ShadowTeleport{@recharge5}
ShadowTeleport{@recharge5}.description: The meazel, any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and any creature it is grappling teleport to an unoccupied space within 500 feet of it, provided that the starting space and the destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination must be a place the meazel has seen before, but it need not be within line of sight. If the destination space is occupied, the teleportation leads to the nearest unoccupied space.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: Any beast or humanoid that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the creature's next turn.

LightSensitivity.name: Light Sensitivity
LightSensitivity.description: While in bright light, the meenlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

ShadowTeleport{@recharge5}.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
ShadowTeleport{@recharge5}.description: As a bonus action, the meenlock can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The merregon makes two halberd attacks, or if an allied fiend of challenge rating 6 or higher is within 60 feet of it, the merregon makes three halberd attacks.

Halberd.name: Halberd
Halberd.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The merrenoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: As a bonus action, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The merrenoloth uses Fear Gaze once and makes one oar attack.

Oar.name: Oar
Oar.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

FearGaze.name: FearGaze
FearGaze.description: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

TelepathicHub.name: Telepathic Hub
TelepathicHub.description: When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mindwitness makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 20 (4d8 + 2) psychic damage. if the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

EyeRays.name: EyeRays
EyeRays.description: The mindwitness shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Moloch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Moloch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Moloch's weapon attacks are magical.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Moloch regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Moloch dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Moloch makes three attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, and one with his whip.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

Many-TailedWhip.name: Many-TailedWhip
Many-TailedWhip.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d4 + 8) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet in a straight line toward Moloch.

BreathofDespair{@recharge5}.name: BreathofDespair{@recharge5}
BreathofDespair{@recharge5}.description: Moloch exhales in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage, drop whatever it is holding, and become frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature must take the Dash action and move away from Moloch by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to Moloch, the creature can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Moloch magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The molydeus' weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The molydeus makes three attacks: one with its weapon, one with its wolf bite, and one with its snakebite.

DemonicWeapon.name: DemonicWeapon
DemonicWeapon.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) slashing damage. If the target has at least one head and the molydeus rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 6d8 slashing damage from the hit.

WolfBite.name: WolfBite
WolfBite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) piercing damage.

Snakebite.name: Snakebite
Snakebite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (1d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target transforms into a manes if this reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This transformation can be ended only by a wish spell.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The morkoth can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The morkoth makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its tentacles or three with its bite.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends. the target is restrained and takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the morkoth's turns. and the morkoth can't use its tentacles on another target.

Hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
Hypnosis.description: The morkoth projects a 30-foot cone of magical energy. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the morkoth for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target tries to get as close to the morkoth as possible, using its actions to Dash until it is within 5 feet of the morkoth. A charmed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature has advantage on saving throws against the morkoth's Hypnosis for 24 hours.

MouthofMadness.name: Mouth of Madness
MouthofMadness.description: The giant is immune to confusion spells and similar magic.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the giant magically regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

DemonicShadows.name: Demonic Shadows
DemonicShadows.description: The nabassu darkens the area around its body in a 10-foot radius. Nonmagical light can't illuminate this area of dim light.

DevourSoul.name: Devour Soul
DevourSoul.description: A nabassu can eat the soul of a creature it has killed within the last hour, provided that creature is neither a construct nor an undead. The devouring requires the nabassu to be within 5 feet of the corpse for at least 10 minutes, after which it gains a number of Hit Dice (d8s) equal to half the creature's number of Hit Dice. Roll those dice, and increase the nabassu's hit points by the numbers rolled. For every 4 Hit Dice the nabassu gains in this way, its attacks deal an extra 3 (1d6) damage on a hit. The nabassu retains these benefits for 6 days. A creature devoured by a nabassu can be restored to life only by a wish spell.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The nabassu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The nabassu's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nabassu uses its Soul-Stealing Gaze and makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (4d12 + 6) piercing damage.

Soul-StealingGaze.name: Soul-StealingGaze
Soul-StealingGaze.description: The nabassu targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the nabassu and isn't a construct or an undead, it must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by 13 (2d12) damage and give the nabassu an equal number of temporary hit points. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0, and if the target is a humanoid, it immediately rises as a ghoul under the nabassu's control.

Corruption.name: Corruption
Corruption.description: As a bonus action, the nagpa targets one creature it can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a DC 20 Charisma saving throw. An evil creature makes the save with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the nagpa until the start of the nagpa's next turn. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to the nagpa's Corruption for the next 24 hours.

Paralysis{@recharge}.name: Paralysis {@recharge}
Paralysis{@recharge}.description: As a bonus action, the nagpa forces each creature within 30 feet of it to succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Undead and constructs are immune to this effect.

Staff.name: Staff
Staff.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

DiabolicalSense.name: Diabolical Sense
DiabolicalSense.description: The narzugon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive good-aligned creatures.

InfernalTack.name: Infernal Tack
InfernalTack.description: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack, which allow it to summon its nightmare companion.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The narzugon uses its Infernal Command or Terrifying Command. It also makes three hellfire lance attacks.

HellfireLance.name: HellfireLance
HellfireLance.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in 1d4 hours.

InfernalCommand.name: InfernalCommand
InfernalCommand.description: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the narzugon's next turn.

TerrifyingCommand.name: TerrifyingCommand
TerrifyingCommand.description: Each creature that isn't a fiend within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or become frightened of it for 1 minute.

Healing(1/Day).name: Healing(1/Day)
Healing(1/Day).description: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains up to 100 hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The necromancer makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) necrotic damage.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The neogi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

Enslave(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enslave(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enslave (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enslave(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The charmed target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: The hatchling has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the hatchling to sleep.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The hatchling can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The neogi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

Enslave(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enslave(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enslave (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enslave(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The charmed target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

CreatureSense.name: Creature Sense
CreatureSense.description: The neothelid is aware of the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The neothelid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the neothelid. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the neothelid, and it takes 35 (10d6) acid damage at the start of each of the neothelid's turns.

AcidBreath{@recharge5}.name: AcidBreath{@recharge5}
AcidBreath{@recharge5}.description: The neothelid exhales acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

AnnihilatingAura.name: Annihilating Aura
AnnihilatingAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the nightwalker must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and grant the nightwalker advantage on attack rolls against it until the start of the creature's next turn. Undead are immune to this aura.

LifeEater.name: Life Eater
LifeEater.description: A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the nightwalker dies and can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nightwalker uses Enervating Focus twice, or it uses Enervating Focus and Finger of Doom, if available.

EnervatingFocus.name: EnervatingFocus
EnervatingFocus.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (5d8 + 6) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

FingerofDoom{@recharge}.name: FingerofDoom{@recharge}
FingerofDoom{@recharge}.description: The nightwalker points at one creature it can see within 300 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and become frightened until the end of the nightwalker's next turn. While frightened in this way, the creature is also paralyzed. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the nightwalker's Finger of Doom for the next 24 hours.

Nilbogism.name: Nilbogism
Nilbogism.description: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature charmed in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The nilbog can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Fool'sScepter.name: Fool'sScepter
Fool'sScepter.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

CloudofVermin.name: Cloud of Vermin
CloudofVermin.description: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the creature takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

Hunger-Driven.name: Hunger-Driven
Hunger-Driven.description: In the Nine Hells, the nupperibos can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo's Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

AversiontoFire.name: Aversion to Fire
AversiontoFire.description: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) psychic damage.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The ogre deals double damage to objects and structures.

Bash.name: Bash
Bash.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the ogre can push the target 5 feet away if the target is Huge or smaller.

BlockthePath.name: BlockthePath
BlockthePath.description: Until the start of the ogre's next turn, attack rolls against the ogre have disadvantage, it has advantage on the attack roll it makes for an opportunity attack, and that attack deals an extra 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage on a hit. Also, each enemy that tries to move out of the ogre's reach without teleporting must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of the ogre's next turn.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

BoltLauncher.name: BoltLauncher
BoltLauncher.description: rw 3 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d10 + 1) piercing damage.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

ChainSweep.name: ChainSweep
ChainSweep.description: The ogre swings its chain, and every creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

ChainSmash{@recharge}.name: ChainSmash{@recharge}
ChainSmash{@recharge}.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is unconscious for 1 minute. The unconscious target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Howdah.name: Howdah
Howdah.description: The ogre carries a compact fort on its back. Up to four Small creatures can ride in the fort without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the ogre, they must use spears or weapons with reach. Creatures in the fort have Cover||3||three-quarters cover against attacks and effects from outside it. If the ogre dies, creatures in the fort are placed in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of the ogre.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

BringerofPlagues{@recharge5}.name: Bringer of Plagues {@recharge 5}
BringerofPlagues{@recharge5}.description: As a bonus action, the oinoloth blights the area within 30 feet of it. The blight lasts for 24 hours. While blighted, all normal plants in the area wither and die, and the number of hit points restored by a spell to a creature in that area is halved.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The oinoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The oinoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The oinoloth uses its Transfixing Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 22 (4d10) necrotic damage.

CorruptedHealing{@recharge}.name: CorruptedHealing{@recharge}
CorruptedHealing{@recharge}.description: The oinoloth touches one willing creature within 5 feet of it. The target regains all its hit points. In addition, the oinoloth can end one disease on the target or remove one of the following conditions from it: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned. The target then gains 1 level of exhaustion, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 7 (2d6). This reduction can be removed only by a wish spell or by casting greater restoration on the target three times within the same hour. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The oinoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

TransfixingGaze.name: TransfixingGaze
TransfixingGaze.description: The oinoloth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed until the end of the oinoloth's next turn. While charmed in this way, the target is restrained. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the oinoloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

WandofOrcus.name: Wand of Orcus
WandofOrcus.description: The wand has 7 charges, and any of its properties that require a saving throw have a save DC of 18. While holding it, Orcus can use an action to cast animate dead, blight, or speak with dead. Alternatively, he can expend 1 or more of the wand's charges to cast one of the following spells from it: circle of death (1 charge), finger of death (1 charge), or power word kill (2 charges). The wand regains 1d4 + 3 charges daily at dawn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Orcus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Orcus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Orcus's weapon attacks are magical.

MasterofUndeath.name: Master of Undeath
MasterofUndeath.description: When Orcus casts animate dead or create undead, he chooses the level at which the spell is cast, and the creatures created by the spells remain under his control indefinitely. Additionally, he can cast create undead even when it isn't night.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Orcus makes two Wand of Orcus attacks.

WandofOrcus.name: WandofOrcus
WandofOrcus.description: mw 19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

InvisibilityField.name: Invisibility Field
InvisibilityField.description: The orthon can use a bonus action to become invisible. Any equipment the orthon wears or carries is also invisible as long as the equipment is on its person. This invisibility ends immediately after the orthon makes an attack roll or is hit by an attack.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

InfernalDagger.name: InfernalDagger
InfernalDagger.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d4 + 6) slashing damage, and the target must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failure, the target is poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

BrassCrossbow.name: BrassCrossbow
BrassCrossbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, plus one of the following effects:

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

BeastofBurden.name: Beast of Burden
BeastofBurden.description: The oxen is considered to be a Huge animal for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

FieryDeathandRebirth.name: Fiery Death and Rebirth
FieryDeathandRebirth.description: When the phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 60-feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't worn or carried.

FireForm.name: Fire Form
FireForm.description: The phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Any creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. With a touch, the phoenix can also ignite flammable objects that aren't worn or carried (no action required).

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The phoenix doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The phoenix sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the phoenix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The phoenix deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The phoenix makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its fiery talons.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

FieryTalons.name: FieryTalons
FieryTalons.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) fire damage.

DiveAttack.name: Dive Attack
DiveAttack.description: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage to the target.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage.

BlurredMovement.name: Blurred Movement
BlurredMovement.description: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is incapacitated or restrained.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abishai can use its Frightful Presence. It also makes three attacks: one with its morningstar, one with its claw, and one with its bite.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 38 (7d10) fire damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of the abishai's choice that is within 120 feet and aware of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the abishai's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

InciteFanaticism.name: InciteFanaticism
InciteFanaticism.description: The abishai chooses up to four of its allies within 60 feet of it that can see it. For 1 minute, each of those allies makes attack rolls with advantage and can't be frightened.

PoweroftheDragonQueen.name: PoweroftheDragonQueen
PoweroftheDragonQueen.description: The abishai targets one dragon it can see within 120 feet of it. The dragon must make a DC 18 Charisma saving throw. A chromatic dragon makes this save with disadvantage. On a successful save, the target is immune to the abishai's Power of the Dragon Queen for 1 hour. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the abishai for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, the target regards the abishai as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. This effect ends if the abishai or its companions deal damage to the target.

IronBoots.name: Iron Boots
IronBoots.description: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

OutsizeStrength.name: Outsize Strength
OutsizeStrength.description: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The redcap makes three attacks with its wicked sickle.

WickedSickle.name: WickedSickle
WickedSickle.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

IronboundPursuit.name: IronboundPursuit
IronboundPursuit.description: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

FaultlessTracker.name: Faultless Tracker
FaultlessTracker.description: The retriever is given a quarry by its master. The quarry can be a specific creature or object the master is personally acquainted with, or it can be a general type of creature or object the master has seen before. The retriever knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The retriever can have only one such quarry at a time. The retriever also always knows the location of its master.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The retriever makes two foreleg attacks and uses its force or paralyzing beam once, if available.

Foreleg.name: Foreleg
Foreleg.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

ForceBeam.name: ForceBeam
ForceBeam.description: The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ParalyzingBeam{@recharge5}.name: ParalyzingBeam{@recharge5}
ParalyzingBeam{@recharge5}.description: The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

RancidDegeneration.name: Rancid Degeneration
RancidDegeneration.description: At the end of each of the troll's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage, unless the troll has taken acid or fire damage since the end of its last turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

CripplingFear.name: Crippling Fear
CripplingFear.description: When a creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet of three or more rutterkins, it must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. The creature has disadvantage on the save if it's within 30 feet of six or more rutterkins. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the Crippling Fear of all rutterkins for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the creature is restrained. At the end of each of the frightened creature's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned. At the end of each long rest, the poisoned target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points while poisoned in this way, it dies and instantly transforms into a living abyssal wretch|mtf. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

TimeBreath{@recharge5}.name: TimeBreath{@recharge5}
TimeBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 60-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage, and it has the poisoned condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself after it succeeds on three of these saves.

CycleofRebirth.name: Cycle of Rebirth
CycleofRebirth.description: If the dragon dies, its soul coalesces into a steely egg and teleports to a random plane of existence. The egg is immune to all damage and hatches into a time dragon wyrmling after 1d100 years. The dragon retains all memories and knowledge it gained in its previous life.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage.

TimeBreath{@recharge5}.name: TimeBreath{@recharge5}
TimeBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 90-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage, it has the poisoned condition, and other creatures have resistance to all damage it deals. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself after it succeeds on three of these saves.

TimeGate(1/Day).name: TimeGate(1/Day)
TimeGate(1/Day).description: The dragon conjures a 20-foot-diameter, circular portal in the space between its horns or in an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself. The portal links to a precise location on any plane of existence at a point in time up to 8,000 years from the present, whether past or future. The portal lasts for 24 hours or until the dragon's concentration ends (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). The portal has a front and a back on each plane where it appears. Travel through the portal is possible only by moving through its front. Anything that does so is transported to the destination, appearing in the unoccupied space nearest to the portal. Deities and other planar rulers can prevent portals created by the dragon from opening in the rulers' presence or anywhere within their domains.

Avoidance.name: Avoidance
Avoidance.description: If the null is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take half as much damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and half as much damage if it fails.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The null makes two Force Dagger attacks.

ForceDagger.name: ForceDagger
ForceDagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) force damage. {@hom}The dagger magically returns to the null's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aurumach makes three Manifested Blade or Gleaming Ray attacks.

ManifestedBlade.name: ManifestedBlade
ManifestedBlade.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) force damage.

GleamingRay.name: GleamingRay
GleamingRay.description: rs 11 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d12 + 5) force damage.

DiveAttack.name: Dive Attack
DiveAttack.description: If the avoral is flying, dives at least 30 feet in a straight line toward a Medium or smaller creature, and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or take 14 (4d6) piercing damage and have the prone condition.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The avoral doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The avoral makes two Talon attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the baernaloth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The baernaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The baernaloth makes one Anguishing Bite attack and one Claw attack. It can also use Teleport.

AnguishingBite.name: AnguishingBite
AnguishingBite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the baernaloth's next turn.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) necrotic damage.

MiasmaofDiscord{@recharge5}.name: MiasmaofDiscord{@recharge5}
MiasmaofDiscord{@recharge5}.description: The baernaloth exhales gray vapors that coalesce at a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. The vapors fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point, then vanish. Each non-yugoloth creature in that area must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) psychic damage and has the charmed condition until the end of its next turn. A creature charmed in this way treats its allies as foes, and the colors of its body and equipment become shades of gray. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

SummonYugoloth(1/Day).name: SummonYugoloth(1/Day)
SummonYugoloth(1/Day).description: The baernaloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d4 mezzoloths, 1 arcanaloth, or 1 baernaloth (the mezzoloth and arcanaloth appear in the Monster Manual). A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the baernaloth, acts as an ally of the baernaloth, and can't summon other yugoloths. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the baernaloth dies, or until the baernaloth dismisses it as an action.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The baernaloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

PortalSense.name: Portal Sense
PortalSense.description: The bariaur can sense the presence of portals within 30 feet of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each one. The bariaur knows the distance and direction to the last portal it used as long as they're on the same plane.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
