Multiattack.description: The bariaur makes two Barbed Javelin or Shortbow attacks.

BarbedJavelin.name: BarbedJavelin
BarbedJavelin.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the bariaur's next turn.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the bariaur moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage if the target doesn't have all its hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The void soother makes two Mace or Void Bolt attacks.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

VoidBolt.name: VoidBolt
VoidBolt.description: rs 4 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) force damage.

SharedTelepathy.name: Shared Telepathy
SharedTelepathy.description: Any creature touching the cranium rat can use the rat's telepathy if the rat allows it. If the creature knows any language, the creature can use the telepathy to communicate words and emotions.

TelepathicShroud.name: Telepathic Shroud
TelepathicShroud.description: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to divination spells.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

PsychicMessenger.name: Psychic Messenger
PsychicMessenger.description: The swarm can use its sending spell to target someone familiar to a creature in telepathic contact with the swarm.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

TelepathicShroud.name: Telepathic Shroud
TelepathicShroud.description: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to divination spells.

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cuprilach makes three Burnished Blade or Bolt attacks.

BurnishedBlade.name: BurnishedBlade
BurnishedBlade.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) psychic damage.

Bolt.name: Bolt
Bolt.description: rw 9 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) psychic damage.

PhysicalRestraint.name: Physical Restraint
PhysicalRestraint.description: The dabus doesn't make melee attacks or opportunity attacks, even in self-defense.

SymbolSpeech.name: Symbol Speech
SymbolSpeech.description: A dabus communicates by creating illusory symbols and pictures that float in the air in front of itself and disappear a few seconds later. A creature that can see such a message can decipher it with a successful DC 10 Intelligence (Investigation) check (no action required).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dabus makes two Flying Brick attacks.

FlyingBrick.name: FlyingBrick
FlyingBrick.description: rs 5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

GraspingGround{@recharge}.name: GraspingGround{@recharge}
GraspingGround{@recharge}.description: The dabus causes a 20-foot-square area of ground it can see within 60 feet of itself to sprout clutching appendages made of stone. Each creature of the dabus's choice in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and have the grappled condition (escape DC 13). While grappled in this way, the creature has the restrained condition. The appendages vanish after 1 minute or if the dabus's concentration ends (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell).

ShadowyForm.name: Shadowy Form
ShadowyForm.description: While the darkweaver is in dim light or darkness, attack rolls against it are made with disadvantage unless the darkweaver has the incapacitated condition.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The darkweaver can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: The darkweaver takes 10 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The darkweaver makes two Shadow Web attacks and one Bite attack. It can use Reel after any of these attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

ShadowWeb.name: ShadowWeb
ShadowWeb.description: rw 7 to hit, reach 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 15). The shadow web can be attacked and destroyed (AC 16; 20 hit points; vulnerability to radiant damage; immunity to bludgeoning, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage). The darkweaver can grapple up to six creatures at a time using its shadow web.

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: The darkweaver pulls each creature it has grappled up to 60 feet toward itself.

AxiomaticMind.name: Axiomatic Mind
AxiomaticMind.description: The decaton can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

CombatReady.name: Combat Ready
CombatReady.description: The decaton has advantage on initiative rolls.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: If the decaton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The decaton makes three Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the decaton can't use this tentacle against other targets. The decaton has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

LightningRays{@recharge}.name: LightningRays{@recharge}
LightningRays{@recharge}.description: The decaton unleashes a barrage of lightning bolts from its eyes. Each creature within 30 feet of the decaton must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 (7d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.

AuraofDoom.name: Aura of Doom
AuraofDoom.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the doom lord must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the doom lord doesn't have the incapacitated condition, it can suppress or resume this aura at the start of its turn (no action required).

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The doom lord deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The doom lord makes two Entropic Greatsword or Entropic Javelin attacks.

EntropicGreatsword.name: EntropicGreatsword
EntropicGreatsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash.

EntropicJavelin.name: EntropicJavelin
EntropicJavelin.description: mw,rw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The rot blade makes two Entropic Blade or Entropic Javelin attacks.

EntropicBlade.name: EntropicBlade
EntropicBlade.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash. {@hom}The rot blade can cause the blade to emit a burst of entropic magic in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the weapon. Each creature in that area other than the rot blade must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 6 (1d12) necrotic damage. The blade can emit entropic magic in this way only once per turn.

EntropicJavelin.name: EntropicJavelin
EntropicJavelin.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash.

BrainsDevoured.name: Brains Devoured
BrainsDevoured.description: When the eater of knowledge is first encountered, roll 1d10 to determine the number of brains it has already consumed.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The eater of knowledge has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eater of knowledge makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same creature and the target is Large or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition until the grapple ends.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Humanoid with the incapacitated condition. on hit: 45 (10d8) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the eater of knowledge kills the target by extracting and consuming its brain.

HeadfirstCharge.name: Headfirst Charge
HeadfirstCharge.description: If the equinal moves at least 30 feet in a straight line toward a creature and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or take 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and have the prone condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The equinal makes two Fist attacks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Shout{@recharge}.name: Shout{@recharge}
Shout{@recharge}.description: The equinal lets out a booming shout. Each creature within 30 feet of the equinal must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of the equinal's next turn.

BoundlessMovement.name: Boundless Movement
BoundlessMovement.description: The farastu ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically remove the grappled condition from itself.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The farastu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The farastu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The farastu makes two Claw attacks and one Bite attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 15, with disadvantage). The farastu has two claws, each of which can grapple one creature.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit (with advantage against a creature the farastu is grappling), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) acid damage.

SummonDemodand(1/Day).name: SummonDemodand(1/Day)
SummonDemodand(1/Day).description: The farastu has a 40 percent chance of summoning 1 farastu demodand. A summoned demodand appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the farastu, acts as an ally of the farastu, and can't summon other demodands. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the farastu dies, or until the farastu dismisses it as an action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shaker makes two Golden Rod or Radiant Bolt attacks.

GoldenRod.name: GoldenRod
GoldenRod.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

RadiantBolt.name: RadiantBolt
RadiantBolt.description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) radiant damage.

BladedEdges.name: Bladed Edges
BladedEdges.description: A creature takes 10 (3d6) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being grappled by the ferrumach.

SkeweringCharge.name: Skewering Charge
SkeweringCharge.description: If the ferrumach moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a Large or smaller creature and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the grappled condition (escape 18) and take 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ferrumach makes three Sharpened Limb or Bolt attacks.

SharpenedLimb.name: SharpenedLimb
SharpenedLimb.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

Bolt.name: Bolt
Bolt.description: rw 8 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The law bender makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Power of Authority or Spellcasting.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) force damage.

PowerofAuthority.name: PowerofAuthority
PowerofAuthority.description: The law bender targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage and have the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the incapacitated condition on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to this law bender's Power of Authority for 24 hours.

PsychicDefense.name: Psychic Defense
PsychicDefense.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike or Psychic Bolt attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

PsychicBolt.name: PsychicBolt
PsychicBolt.description: rs 7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) psychic damage.

PsychicDefense.name: Psychic Defense
PsychicDefense.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

PsychicDefense.name: Psychic Defense
PsychicDefense.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike or Psychic Bolt attacks. It can replace any of these attacks with one use of its Pacifying Touch.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

PsychicBolt.name: PsychicBolt
PsychicBolt.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 17 (5d6) psychic damage.

PacifyingTouch.name: PacifyingTouch
PacifyingTouch.description: The githzerai touches one creature it can see within 5 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw, or the githzerai chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, or Dash. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a successful save. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to this githzerai's Pacifying Touch for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fire starter makes two Havoc Hammer or Havoc Flask attacks.

HavocHammer.name: HavocHammer
HavocHammer.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage. If the target is a creature, magical flames cling to it, causing it to take 3 (1d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. Immediately after taking this damage on its turn, the target can make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

HavocFlask.name: HavocFlask
HavocFlask.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d12) fire damage. If the target is a creature, magical flames cling to it, causing it to take 3 (1d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. Immediately after taking this damage on its turn, the target can make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

AuraofCommand.name: Aura of Command
AuraofCommand.description: Allies within 30 feet of the captain are immune to the charmed and frightened conditions. This aura is suppressed while the captain has the incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The captain makes three Harmonium Blade attacks. The captain can also use Dictate if available.

HarmoniumBlade.name: HarmoniumBlade
HarmoniumBlade.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

Dictate{@recharge5}.name: Dictate{@recharge5}
Dictate{@recharge5}.description: The captain verbally commands up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of itself. This magical command must be to undertake an action or to refrain from taking actions (for example, "Throw down your weapons").

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The peacekeeper has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the peacekeeper's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

ElectrifiedMancatcher.name: ElectrifiedMancatcher
ElectrifiedMancatcher.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until the grappled condition ends, the target has the restrained condition and can't teleport, the peacekeeper can't make Electrified Mancatcher attacks, and the target takes 8 (1d10 + 3) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The remnant makes two Necrotic Surge attacks.

NecroticSurge.name: NecroticSurge
NecroticSurge.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) necrotic damage.

AxiomaticMind.name: Axiomatic Mind
AxiomaticMind.description: The hexton can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

CombatReady.name: Combat Ready
CombatReady.description: The hexton has advantage on initiative rolls.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: If the hexton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the hexton fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hexton makes one Pincer attack and two Tentacle attacks.

Pincer.name: Pincer
Pincer.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the hexton can't use this tentacle against other targets. The hexton has six tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

AuraofMenace.name: Aura of Menace
AuraofMenace.description: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the archon must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archon makes two Bite attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Shining Blade attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

ShiningBlade(TrueFormOnly).name: ShiningBlade(TrueFormOnly)
ShiningBlade(TrueFormOnly).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) radiant damage.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The archon teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet of itself.

AcidicSecretions.name: Acidic Secretions
AcidicSecretions.description: A creature that touches the kelubar or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage.

BoundlessMovement.name: Boundless Movement
BoundlessMovement.description: The kelubar ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically remove the grappled condition from itself.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The kelubar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kelubar makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) acid damage.

SpitAcid.name: SpitAcid
SpitAcid.description: The kelubar spits acid in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

SummonDemodand(1/Day).name: SummonDemodand(1/Day)
SummonDemodand(1/Day).description: The kelubar has a 40 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d2 farastu demodands or 1 kelubar demodand. A summoned demodand appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the kelubar, acts as an ally of the kelubar, and can't summon other demodands. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the kelubar dies, or until the kelubar dismisses it as an action.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The kolyarut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the kolyarut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The kolyarut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kolyarut makes four Unerring Blade attacks.

UnerringBlade.name: UnerringBlade
UnerringBlade.description: mw automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 24 force damage plus one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d6):

EdictofBlades{@recharge5}.name: EdictofBlades{@recharge5}
EdictofBlades{@recharge5}.description: The kolyarut moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and can make one Unerring Blade attack against each creature it moves past. Whenever it hits a creature with an Unerring Blade attack during this movement, each spell of 5th level or lower on the creature ends, and the creature has the incapacitated condition until the end of the kolyarut's next turn.

PlaneShift(3/Day).name: PlaneShift(3/Day)
PlaneShift(3/Day).description: The kolyarut casts plane shift, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. The kolyarut can cast the spell normally, or it can cast the spell on an unwilling creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. If it uses the latter option, the targeted creature must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or be sent to a teleportation circle in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil.

AuraofMenace.name: Aura of Menace
AuraofMenace.description: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the archon must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The archon sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The archon can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it takes 5 (1d10) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archon makes two Radiant Strike attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Teleport.

RadiantStrike.name: RadiantStrike
RadiantStrike.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) radiant damage.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The archon teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet of itself.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The maelephant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The maelephant makes one Barbed Trunk attack and two Glaive attacks.

BarbedTrunk.name: BarbedTrunk
BarbedTrunk.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) poison damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition. While it is grappling a creature, the maelephant can't use its barbed trunk to attack other creatures.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

MindPoison{@recharge5}.name: MindPoison{@recharge5}
MindPoison{@recharge5}.description: The maelephant expels poisonous gas from its trunk in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 39 (6d12) poison damage and has the poisoned condition. While poisoned in this way, the creature loses all weapon and skill proficiencies, it can't cast spells, it can't understand language, and it has disadvantage on Intelligence saving throws. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only and is immune to this maelephant's Mind Poison for 24 hours.

PortalSense.name: Portal Sense
PortalSense.description: The bloodhound can sense the presence of portals within 30 feet of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each portal.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bloodhound makes three Clawed Gauntlet attacks.

ClawedGauntlet.name: ClawedGauntlet
ClawedGauntlet.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The matter smith makes two Manifested Force attacks.

ManifestedForce.name: ManifestedForce
ManifestedForce.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The musteval makes two Bone Blade attacks.

BoneBlade.name: BoneBlade
BoneBlade.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

AxiomaticMind.name: Axiomatic Mind
AxiomaticMind.description: The nonaton can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

CombatReady.name: Combat Ready
CombatReady.description: The nonaton has advantage on initiative rolls.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: If the nonaton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nonaton makes three Arm attacks and uses Pillar of Truth or Spellcasting.

Arm.name: Arm
Arm.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the nonaton can't use this arm against other targets. The nonaton has nine arms, each of which can grapple one target.

PillarofTruth.name: PillarofTruth
PillarofTruth.description: The nonaton chooses a point on the ground that it can see within 60 feet of itself. A 60-foot-tall, 20-foot-radius cylinder of magical force rises from that point. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 21 (6d6) force damage, and the creature reverts to its original form (if it's in a different form) and can't assume a different form until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

AxiomaticMind.name: Axiomatic Mind
AxiomaticMind.description: The octon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

CombatReady.name: Combat Ready
CombatReady.description: The octon has advantage on initiative checks.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: If the octon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The octon makes three Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

WhirlwindofTentacles{@recharge5}.name: WhirlwindofTentacles{@recharge5}
WhirlwindofTentacles{@recharge5}.description: The octon rapidly extends and spins its ring of tentacles. Each creature within 20 feet of the octon must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward the octon. Then, the octon makes two Tentacle attacks against each creature within 10 feet of itself.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the incarnate fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The incarnate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PlanarForm.name: Planar Form
PlanarForm.description: An incarnate on the Upper Planes is a Celestial. An incarnate on the Lower Planes is a Fiend.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The incarnate deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The incarnate makes two Slam or Energy Bolt attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) force damage.

EnergyBolt.name: EnergyBolt
EnergyBolt.description: rs 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (5d12) necrotic damage if the incarnate is a Fiend or radiant damage if the incarnate is a Celestial.

PlanarExhalation{@recharge5}.name: PlanarExhalation{@recharge5}
PlanarExhalation{@recharge5}.description: The incarnate exhales concentrated energy native to its plane in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) necrotic damage if the incarnate is a Fiend or radiant damage if the incarnate is a Celestial, and the creature has the blinded condition until the end of the incarnate's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the blight is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. If a creature hasn't observed the blight move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the blight is animate.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The blight can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blight makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit (with advantage if the target is missing any of its hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Life-DrainingVines{@recharge}.name: Life-DrainingVines{@recharge}
Life-DrainingVines{@recharge}.description: Snaking vines erupt from the blight. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) slashing damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If at least one of the creatures that failed this save isn't a Construct or an Undead, the blight regains 9 hit points.

AxiomaticMind.name: Axiomatic Mind
AxiomaticMind.description: The septon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

CombatReady.name: Combat Ready
CombatReady.description: The septon has advantage on initiative checks.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: If the septon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The septon makes four Tentacle attacks and uses Lightning Network or Spellcasting.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the septon can't use this tentacle against other targets. The septon has seven tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

LightningNetwork.name: LightningNetwork
LightningNetwork.description: The septon conjures a field of electricity that fills a 30-foot cube originating from itself before dissipating. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) lightning damage and has the stunned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

BoundlessMovement.name: Boundless Movement
BoundlessMovement.description: The shator ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically remove the grappled condition from itself.

Jailer(1/Day).name: Jailer
Jailer(1/Day).description: The shator can cast the imprisonment spell, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (chaining effect only; spell save DC 18).

LiquefactionRitual.name: Liquefaction Ritual
LiquefactionRitual.description: The shator can perform a 1-minute ritual that turns all willing farastus and kelubars of its choice within 60 feet of itself into a living liquid form. Each liquefied demodand becomes enough liquid to fill a flask. A demodand's liquefaction lasts until a shator uses an action to end it or a creature opens a container holding the liquid. While liquefied in this way, a demodand has the paralyzed condition despite any immunity to that condition, it has immunity to all damage, and any curse affecting it is suspended.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The shator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

NumbingSecretions.name: Numbing Secretions
NumbingSecretions.description: A creature that touches the shator or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls and its speed halved until the end of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shator makes one Bite attack and two Enervating Trident attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the paralyzed condition until the start of the shator's next turn.

EnervatingTrident.name: EnervatingTrident
EnervatingTrident.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) necrotic damage.

InhibitorySpray{@recharge5}.name: InhibitorySpray{@recharge5}
InhibitorySpray{@recharge5}.description: The shator exhales a spray of slime in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 40 (9d8) acid damage and has the paralyzed condition for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

SummonDemodand(1/Day).name: SummonDemodand(1/Day)
SummonDemodand(1/Day).description: The shator has a 50 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d4 farastu demodands, 1d2 kelubar demodands, or 1 shator demodand. A summoned demodand appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the shator, acts as an ally of the shator, and can't summon other demodands. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the shator dies, or until the shator dismisses it as an action.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If Shemeshka fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Shemeshka has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Shemeshka carries a magic crown called the Razorvine Tiara. In the hands of anyone other than Shemeshka, the Razorvine Tiara functions as a tentacle rod that deals slashing damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Shemeshka uses Arcane Flux or Spellcasting. She then makes one Claw attack or one attack with her Razorvine Tiara.

ArcaneFlux.name: ArcaneFlux
ArcaneFlux.description: Shemeshka causes a surge of arcane energy to burst around one creature she can see within 120 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 45 (7d12) force damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

RazorvineTiara.name: RazorvineTiara
RazorvineTiara.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, or its speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The muse makes two Beguiling Resonance attacks.

BeguilingResonance.name: BeguilingResonance
BeguilingResonance.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes until the end of its next turn.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Additionally, if the sunfly is on an Outer Plane, it injects the target with a toxin, the effect of which is determined by the sunfly's location:

UpperPlane.name: UpperPlane
UpperPlane.description: The target sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius until the end of its next turn.

NeutralPlane.name: NeutralPlane
NeutralPlane.description: If the target is concentration||concentrating on a spell or similar effect, it makes the Constitution saving throw with disadvantage to maintain its concentration.

LowerPlane.name: LowerPlane
LowerPlane.description: The target's speed is reduced by 5 feet until the end of its next turn.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny dragonfly. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Stings.name: Stings
Stings.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. on hit: 10 (3d4 + 3) piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. Additionally, if the swarm is on an Outer Plane, it injects the target with a toxin, the effect of which is determined by the swarm's location:

UpperPlane.name: UpperPlane
UpperPlane.description: The target sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius until the end of its next turn. During that time, the invisible condition has no effect on it.

NeutralPlane.name: NeutralPlane
NeutralPlane.description: If the target is concentration||concentrating on a spell or similar effect, it loses its concentration.

LowerPlane.name: LowerPlane
LowerPlane.description: The target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

DazzlingLights{@recharge}.name: DazzlingLights{@recharge}
DazzlingLights{@recharge}.description: The swarm shines its lights in a dazzling display. Each creature within 15 feet of the swarm must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

TimeBreath{@recharge5}.name: TimeBreath{@recharge5}
TimeBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 15-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

InstinctiveReflexes.name: Instinctive Reflexes
InstinctiveReflexes.description: The conduit has advantage on initiative rolls, and it can't have disadvantage on attack rolls.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the conduit is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The conduit makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the conduit can choose one of the following additional effects (up to once per turn each):

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the instinct is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The instinct makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The vargouille has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

AbyssalCurse.name: AbyssalCurse
AbyssalCurse.description: The vargouille targets one Humanoid within 5 feet of itself that has the incapacitated condition. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed. The cursed target's Charisma decreases by 1 after each hour, as its head takes on fiendish aspects, and its Charisma can't increase. The curse doesn't advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell. When the cursed target's Charisma becomes 2, the target dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille reflection. Casting remove curse, greater restoration, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete ends the curse and restores the target's Charisma.

HorrificReflection{@recharge5}.name: HorrificReflection{@recharge5}
HorrificReflection{@recharge5}.description: The vargouille's head mimics that of a Humanoid the vargouille can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage and have the frightened condition for 1 hour or until the vargouille loses concentration (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). If the target's saving throw is successful or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Horrific Reflection of all vargouille reflections for 1 hour.

AuraofMenace.name: Aura of Menace
AuraofMenace.description: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the archon must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

EternalVigil.name: Eternal Vigil
EternalVigil.description: The archon can't be surprised. Moreover, it knows when any creature uses a portal it is assigned to guard.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archon makes two Claw attacks and one Tracker's Bite attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). The archon can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

Tracker'sBite.name: Tracker'sBite
Tracker'sBite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, for the next 24 hours, the archon knows the distance and direction to the target while they are both on the same plane of existence.

Teleport.name: Teleport

TimeBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 30-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 31 (7d8) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself after it succeeds on two of these saves.

A creature takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. As a bonus action, the oaken bolter can pull a creature grappled by it 20 feet closer. Regardless of whether charges are drained, the phaerimm can cast Clairvoyance|XPHB, Geas|XPHB, Major Image|XPHB, and Mirage Arcane|XPHB one additional time that day.

WeirdlyPliable.description: The zealot, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is unnaturally flexible. The zealot can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

DarkOne'sOwnLuck(RechargesafteraShortorL.description: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Dirt-Under-Nails regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he is in contact with the ground. If Dirt-Under-Nails takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Dirt-Under-Nails dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

SharedSenses.name: Shared Senses
SharedSenses.description: Dirt-Under-Nails can see and hear what any plant within 120 ft can see and hear. In addition, Dirt-Under- Nails can communicate telepathically with any plant within this range.

SpecialEquipment(+2RodofthePactKeeper).name: Special Equipment (+2 Rod of the Pact Keeper)
SpecialEquipment(+2RodofthePactKeeper).description: While holding this +2 Rod of the Pact Keeper||rod, Dirt-Under-Nails gains a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of his warlock spells (included in modifications, below). In addition, he can regain 1 warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. He can't use this property again until he finishes a long rest.

TreeStride.name: Tree Stride
TreeStride.description: Once on each of its turns, Dirt-Under-Nails can use 10 feet of his movement to step magically into one copse of mushrooms within 5 feet of him and emerge from a second copse of mushrooms within 60 feet of it, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second copse. Both copses of mushrooms must be Large or bigger. Dirt-Under-Nails doesn't need to be able to see the second copse to use this ability.

PlantCamouflage.description: The rotter has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The rotter regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in contact with the ground. If the rotter takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the rotter's next turn. The rotter dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

SharedSenses.name: Shared Senses
SharedSenses.description: The rotter can see and hear what any plant within 120 ft can see and hear. In addition, the rotter can communicate telepathically with any plant within this range.

TreeStride.name: Tree Stride
TreeStride.description: Once on each of its turns, the rotter can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one copse of mushrooms within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second copse of mushrooms within 60 feet of it, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second copse. Both copses of mushrooms must be Large or bigger. The rotter doesn't need to be able to see the second copse to use this ability.

Multiattack.description: The rotter makes two attacks with its club.

Club.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

EnigmaticMind.name: Enigmatic Mind
EnigmaticMind.description: The archaic's mind can't be read, creatures can communicate telepathically with the archaic only if it allows, and magic can't determine whether the archaic is lying.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the archaic fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The archaic doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archaic makes two Force Strike attacks. It can also use Gravity Shift, if available.

ForceStrike.name: ForceStrike
ForceStrike.description: ms,rs 14 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) force damage, and the target is pulled up to 10 feet toward the archaic or pushed 10 feet away from it, as the archaic chooses.

GravityShift{@recharge5}.name: GravityShift{@recharge5}
GravityShift{@recharge5}.description: The archaic reverses gravity for one creature it can see within 100 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or fall 100 feet upward. If the falling creature encounters a solid object (such as a ceiling) in this fall, it strikes the object just as it would during a downward fall. If the creature reaches the top of the area without striking anything, it hovers there until the start of the archaic's next turn, at which time gravity returns to normal and the creature falls.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The archaic teleports to an unoccupied space that it can see within 120 feet of itself.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the elemental dies, it explodes in a burst of colored light. Each creature within 5 feet of the elemental must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

JoyfulFlare.name: JoyfulFlare
JoyfulFlare.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) fire damage.

MelancholicBolt.name: MelancholicBolt
MelancholicBolt.description: rw 3 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) cold damage.

CaptivatingArtistry(1/Day).name: CaptivatingArtistry(1/Day)
CaptivatingArtistry(1/Day).description: The elemental targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Beledros fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Beledros doesn't require air, food, or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Beledros makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

DecayingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DecayingBreath{@recharge5}
DecayingBreath{@recharge5}.description: Beledros exhales decaying energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 39 (6d12) necrotic damage and 39 (6d12) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that takes damage from the breath can't regain hit points until the start of Beledros's next turn.

MiasmalFlow.name: MiasmalFlow
MiasmalFlow.description: Beledros becomes a swirling cloud of green mist and can move up to half her flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then resumes her true form. During this movement, she can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. If she moves through a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of its next turn. If Beledros ends this move inside an object, she takes 5 (1d10) force damage and is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space.

FungalFortitude.name: Fungal Fortitude
FungalFortitude.description: If damage reduces the trudge to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the trudge drops to 1 hit point instead.

Tusk.name: Tusk
Tusk.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The archivist has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archivist makes two Grasping Limb attacks.

GraspingLimb.name: GraspingLimb
GraspingLimb.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). The archivist can have no more than two targets grappled at a time.

PactofPain.name: Pact of Pain
PactofPain.description: Using a 10-minute ritual, the daemogoth can forge a magical bond with a willing creature it touches throughout the ritual. The creature becomes bound by the pact until it dies, the daemogoth dies, or the pact is broken by any effect that can remove a curse.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The daemogoth makes three Agonizing Burst attacks. It can use Terrify, if available, in place of one of the attacks.

AgonizingBurst.name: AgonizingBurst
AgonizingBurst.description: ms,rs 9 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d10) force damage. If the target is a creature, the daemogoth regains 5 hit points.

Terrify{@recharge4}.name: Terrify{@recharge4}
Terrify{@recharge4}.description: The daemogoth targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 33 (6d10) psychic damage and is frightened of the daemogoth until the end of the daemogoth's next turn, and the daemogoth regains 5 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't frightened, and the daemogoth doesn't heal.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the titan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

PactofSuffering.name: Pact of Suffering
PactofSuffering.description: Using a 10-minute long ritual, the titan can forge a magical bond with a willing creature it touches throughout the ritual. The creature becomes bound by the pact until it dies, the titan dies, or the pact is broken by a wish spell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The titan makes two Agonizing Burst attacks.

AgonizingBurst.name: AgonizingBurst
AgonizingBurst.description: ms,rs 12 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) force damage. If the target is a creature, the titan regains 5 hit points.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The titan teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet of itself.

ExcitedtoBeHere.name: Excited to Be Here
ExcitedtoBeHere.description: The student has advantage on initiative rolls.

MagicFlare.name: MagicFlare
MagicFlare.description: ms,rs 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d12 + 1) force damage.

RelativeDensity.name: Relative Density
RelativeDensity.description: The fractal can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

QuantumStrike.name: QuantumStrike
QuantumStrike.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage, or 6 (2d4 + 1) force damage if the fractal is Medium or bigger.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Galazeth fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.description: Galazeth makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (1d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d6 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

DancingElementsBreath{@recharge5}.name: DancingElementsBreath{@recharge5}
DancingElementsBreath{@recharge5}.description: Galazeth exhales a blast of flames and ice in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, gaining no benefit from cover (other than Cover||3||total cover) and taking 38 (7d10) fire damage and 38 (7d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the groff is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the groff move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the groff isn't an ordinary moss-covered bog patch.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The groff can hold its breath for up to 1 hour.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The groff makes one Bite attack and one Swamp Claw attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

SwampClaw.name: SwampClaw
SwampClaw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or become engulfed by the groff. While engulfed, the target can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. When the groff moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The groff can have only one target engulfed at a time.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The inkling can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Blot.name: Blot
Blot.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) psychic damage.

InkSpray(1/Day).name: InkSpray(1/Day)
InkSpray(1/Day).description: The inkling sprays viscous ink at one creature within 15 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the inkling's next turn.

ScrollBash.name: ScrollBash
ScrollBash.description: ms 4 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) thunder damage.

ReducetoMemory{@recharge}.name: ReducetoMemory{@recharge}
ReducetoMemory{@recharge}.description: Thundering golden energy erupts around a creature the apprentice can see within 90 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Construct has disadvantage on the saving throw.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The pledgemage makes two Scroll Bash attacks.

ScrollBash.name: ScrollBash
ScrollBash.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) thunder damage.

ReducetoMemory{@recharge5}.name: ReducetoMemory{@recharge5}
ReducetoMemory{@recharge5}.description: Thundering golden energy erupts around a creature the pledgemage can see within 90 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Construct has disadvantage on the saving throw.

VoicefromthePast(1/Day).name: Voice from the Past
VoicefromthePast(1/Day).description: The professor can cast the contact other plane spell to contact a long-dead spirit, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Spectral Scroll attacks. It can also use Weight of History, if available.

SpectralScroll.name: SpectralScroll
SpectralScroll.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

WeightofHistory{@recharge5}.name: WeightofHistory{@recharge5}
WeightofHistory{@recharge5}.description: The professor magically compresses time around up to six creatures of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be restrained for 1 minute, but the restrained target's speed is halved instead of being reduced to 0. At the start of each of its turns, the restrained target takes 4 (1d8) force damage. A restrained target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

VoicefromthePast(1/Day).name: Voice from the Past
VoicefromthePast(1/Day).description: The professor can cast the contact other plane spell to contact a long-dead spirit, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Repelling Burst attacks. It can also use Force Barrier, if available.

RepellingBurst.name: RepellingBurst
RepellingBurst.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the professor and become restrained until the start of professor's next turn.

ForceBarrier{@recharge5}.name: ForceBarrier{@recharge5}
ForceBarrier{@recharge5}.description: The professor magically creates a wall of translucent, golden force within 90 feet of itself. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the professor uses this action again. The barrier can be a vertical or horizontal plane up to 30 feet on a side or a 10-foot-radius hemispherical dome with a floor. The wall provides Cover||3||total cover. It has AC 17, 30 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

MagicSense.name: Magic Sense
MagicSense.description: The hunter knows the location of every spellcaster, active spell, and magic item within 120 feet of itself.

SpiderClimb(HunterFormOnly).name: Spider Climb (Hunter Form Only)
SpiderClimb(HunterFormOnly).description: The hunter can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack(HunterFormOnly).name: Multiattack(HunterFormOnly)
Multiattack(HunterFormOnly).description: The hunter makes two Claw attacks.

Claw(HunterFormOnly).name: Claw(HunterFormOnly)
Claw(HunterFormOnly).description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the hunter can't make a Tail attack against another target.

MageTracker(SentryFormOnly).name: MageTracker(SentryFormOnly)
MageTracker(SentryFormOnly).description: The hunter emits a pulse of energy that helps it better locate its magical quarry. Each creature within 120 feet of the hunter that has the ability to cast spells must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be mystically marked by the hunter for 1 hour.

BloodAegis.name: Blood Aegis
BloodAegis.description: The AC of Murgaxor includes his Constitution modifier while he isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

OriqMask.name: Oriq Mask
OriqMask.description: Murgaxor wears an Oriq mask. While wearing the mask, Murgaxor can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors, and he adds double his proficiency bonus to Charisma (Deception) checks (included above).

SanguineSense.name: Sanguine Sense
SanguineSense.description: While Murgaxor isn't blinded, he can see any creature that isn't an Undead or a Construct within 60 feet of himself, even through Cover||3||total cover, heavily obscured areas, invisibility, or any other phenomena that would prevent sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Murgaxor makes two Blood Lash attacks.

BloodLash.name: BloodLash
BloodLash.description: ms 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of Murgaxor's next turn.

BloodBoil{@recharge4}.name: BloodBoil{@recharge4}
BloodBoil{@recharge4}.description: Murgaxor chooses a point within 150 feet of himself, and a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point fills with a burst of searing, blood-red mist. Each creature of Murgaxor's choice that he can see in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) necrotic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated. A creature dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this necrotic damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the Oracle fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Oracle makes two Magic Flare attacks. She can also use Paradoxy, if available.

MagicFlare.name: MagicFlare
MagicFlare.description: ms,rs 10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d12 + 5) force damage.

Paradoxy{@recharge4}.name: Paradoxy{@recharge4}
Paradoxy{@recharge4}.description: Momentary warps in reality appear at three different points the Oracle can see within 120 feet of her. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on each point must make a DC 18 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) force damage and is pulled up to 15 feet in a straight line toward the center of the sphere. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled. A creature caught in the area of multiple warps is affected by only one, which the Oracle chooses.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The Oracle teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space she can see within 60 feet of herself.

BloodAegis.name: Blood Aegis
BloodAegis.description: The AC of the blood mage includes its Constitution modifier while it isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

OriqMask.name: Oriq Mask
OriqMask.description: The blood mage wears an Oriq mask. While wearing the mask, the blood mage can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors, and it adds double its proficiency bonus to Charisma (Deception) checks (included above).

SanguineSense.name: Sanguine Sense
SanguineSense.description: While the blood mage isn't blinded, it can see any creature that isn't an Undead or a Construct within 60 feet of itself, even through Cover||3||total cover, heavily obscured areas, invisibility, or any other phenomena that would prevent sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blood mage makes two Blood Lash attacks.

BloodLash.name: BloodLash
BloodLash.description: ms 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the blood mage's next turn.

BloodBoil{@recharge4}.name: BloodBoil{@recharge4}
BloodBoil{@recharge4}.description: The blood mage chooses a point within 150 feet of itself, and a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point fills with a burst of searing, blood-red mist. Each creature of the blood mage's choice that it can see in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) necrotic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated. A creature dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this necrotic damage.

MisdirectingDefense.name: Misdirecting Defense
MisdirectingDefense.description: The AC of the recruiter includes its Charisma modifier while it isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

OriqMask.name: Oriq Mask
OriqMask.description: The recruiter wears an Oriq mask. While wearing the mask, the recruiter can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors, and it adds double its proficiency bonus to Charisma (Deception) checks (included above).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The recruiter makes two Psychic Knife attacks. It can use Spellcasting in place of one of the attacks.

PsychicKnife.name: PsychicKnife
PsychicKnife.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. on hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) psychic damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The pest regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If it takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the pest's next turn.

SpinyHide.name: Spiny Hide
SpinyHide.description: At the start of each of its turns, the pest deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it or that it is grappling.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

ElementalStrike.name: ElementalStrike
ElementalStrike.description: ms,rs 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) fire or cold damage (the apprentice's choice).

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the pledgemage is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the pledgemage instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided it isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The pledgemage makes two Elemental Strike attacks.

ElementalStrike.name: ElementalStrike
ElementalStrike.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) fire or cold damage (the pledgemage's choice).

Showstopper(1/Day).name: Showstopper(1/Day)
Showstopper(1/Day).description: The pledgemage shines with elemental magic, targeting one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) fire or cold damage (the pledgemage's choice) and is stunned until the start of the pledgemage's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes three Cinder Strike attacks.

CinderStrike.name: CinderStrike
CinderStrike.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) fire damage.

LightningFlourish{@recharge}.name: LightningFlourish{@recharge}
LightningFlourish{@recharge}.description: The professor unleashes arcs of magical lightning at up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

WaterWalking.name: Water Walking
WaterWalking.description: The professor can walk across water and other liquids as if they were solid ground.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes three Tidal Strike attacks.

TidalStrike.name: TidalStrike
TidalStrike.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) cold damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The apprentice makes two Exponential Lash attacks.

ExponentialLash.name: ExponentialLash
ExponentialLash.description: ms,rs 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) force damage, and the apprentice can cause one creature it can see within 30 feet of the target to take 9 (2d6 + 2) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The pledgemage makes two Exponential Lash attacks.

ExponentialLash.name: ExponentialLash
ExponentialLash.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage, and the pledgemage can cause one creature it can see within 30 feet of the target to take 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Spatial Blade attacks.

SpatialBlade.name: SpatialBlade
SpatialBlade.description: ms,rs 7 to hit (the target can't benefit from cover less than Cover||3||total cover), reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage, or 22 (4d8 + 4) force damage if the professor is Large or larger, and the professor can push the target horizontally up to 10 feet away.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Heuristic Lance attacks. It can also use Overriding Theorem, if available.

HeuristicLance.name: HeuristicLance
HeuristicLance.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) psychic damage, and the target is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

OverridingTheorem{@recharge4}.name: OverridingTheorem{@recharge4}
