OverridingTheorem{@recharge4}.description: The professor magically influences the mind of up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or become charmed by the professor until the start of the professor's next turn. The charmed creature must immediately use its reaction, if available, to move up its speed toward another creature of the professor's choice and make one melee attack against that other creature.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). The relic sloth can grapple no more than two targets at a time.

FireAbsorption.name: Fire Absorption
FireAbsorption.description: Whenever the ruin grinder is subjected to fire damage, it regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The ruin grinder deals double damage to objects and structures.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The ruin grinder can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ruin grinder makes two Excavator attacks.

Excavator.name: Excavator
Excavator.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) force damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d3 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Shadrix fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Shadrix makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is wracked with despair and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

IlluminatingShadowBreath{@recharge5}.name: IlluminatingShadowBreath{@recharge5}
IlluminatingShadowBreath{@recharge5}.description: Shadrix exhales an entwined burst of blinding radiance and unnerving shadow in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 31 (7d8) radiant damage and 31 (7d8) psychic damage and is blinded until the start of Shadrix's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

InkBlade.name: InkBlade
InkBlade.description: ms,rs 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

InkBlade.name: InkBlade
InkBlade.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Radiant Strike attacks. The professor can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

RadiantStrike.name: RadiantStrike
RadiantStrike.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) radiant damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the professor's darkvision.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Ink Lance attacks. The professor can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

InkLance.name: InkLance
InkLance.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw be blinded until the end of its next turn.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the spirit statue is reduced to 0 hit points, the statue crumbles, and the spirit returns to the afterlife in a burst of ghostly white flame. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

CounselofthePast(2/Day).name: CounselofthePast(2/Day)
CounselofthePast(2/Day).description: The spirit statue touches one creature. Once within the next 10 minutes, that creature can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice, immediately after rolling the d20.

CampusKnowledge.name: Campus Knowledge
CampusKnowledge.description: While at Strixhaven, the guide can't become lost by magical or nonmagical means. The guide also has advantage on ability checks made to locate creatures or objects at Strixhaven.

UnivocalSpeech.name: Univocal Speech
UnivocalSpeech.description: When the guide speaks, any creature that knows at least one language and can hear the guide understands what it says.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The guide doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The guide makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

SmileandWave.name: SmileandWave
SmileandWave.description: Each creature of the guide's choice that is within 30 feet of the guide must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the guide for 1 hour.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Tanazir fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tanazir makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is addled by recursive thoughts, reducing its speed to 0 until the start of Tanazir's next turn.

DiminutionBreath{@recharge5}.name: DiminutionBreath{@recharge5}
DiminutionBreath{@recharge5}.description: Tanazir exhales a weakening equation in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (13d6) force damage and 45 (13d6) psychic damage and is weakened until the start of Tanazir's next turn. While weakened, it has disadvantage on the following rolls that rely on Strength: attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Tanazir teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 100 feet of herself.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Velomachus fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Velomachus makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (1d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) thunder damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (1d6 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

BattleTideBreath{@recharge5}.name: BattleTideBreath{@recharge5}
BattleTideBreath{@recharge5}.description: Velomachus exhales thunderous sound in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 45 (7d12) force damage and 45 (7d12) thunder damage and is pushed up to 20 feet in a horizontal direction of Velomachus' choice. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed. Objects that aren't being worn or carried take the damage and are pushed as if they were creatures that failed the saving throw.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The apprentice regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

VerdantTalisman.name: Verdant Talisman
VerdantTalisman.description: At the end of a 10-minute ritual, the apprentice can touch one willing creature (including itself) and bestow upon it a small talisman imbued with magic. Upon receiving the talisman, the creature gains 10 temporary hit points, and it can add 1d6 to its initiative rolls while it wears the talisman. These benefits last for 1 hour or until the apprentice conducts another ritual to bestow another talisman. When the benefits expire, the talisman crumbles to dust.

BriarVine.name: BriarVine
BriarVine.description: ms 4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the apprentice can pull it up to 10 feet closer to itself.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: As long as the pledgemage has at least 1 hit point remaining, the pledgemage regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn.

VerdantTalisman.name: Verdant Talisman
VerdantTalisman.description: At the end of a 10-minute ritual, the pledgemage can touch one willing creature (including itself) and bestow upon it a small talisman imbued with magic. Upon receiving the talisman, the creature gains 10 temporary hit points, and it can add 1d6 to its initiative rolls while it wears the talisman. These benefits last for 1 hour or until the pledgemage conducts another ritual to bestow another talisman. When the benefits expire, the talisman crumbles to dust.

BriarVine.name: BriarVine
BriarVine.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the apprentice can pull it up to 10 feet closer to itself.

EssenceTransfer(1/Day).name: Essence Transfer
EssenceTransfer(1/Day).description: The professor can cast the animate dead spell, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Mortality Spear attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

MortalitySpear.name: MortalitySpear
MortalitySpear.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the professor's next turn.

EssencePulse{@recharge5}.name: EssencePulse{@recharge5}
EssencePulse{@recharge5}.description: The professor creates a life-draining vortex in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature of the professor's choice that it can see within that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 23 (5d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The professor then regains 10 hit points. An affected creature's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The creature dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The professor makes two Verdant Lash attacks.

VerdantLash.name: VerdantLash
VerdantLash.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet closer to the professor.

SummonNature'sAvatar(RechargesafteraShor.name: SummonNature'sAvatar(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Summon Nature's Avatar (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SummonNature'sAvatar(RechargesafteraShor.description: The professor magically summons a Groff. The groff appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the professor, acts as the professor's ally, and takes its turns immediately after the professor's. The professor can communicate telepathically with this groff while it remains. The groff remains for 10 minutes, until it or the professor dies, or until the professor dismisses it as an action.

BloodAegis.name: Blood Aegis
BloodAegis.description: The AC of Y'demi includes her Constitution modifier while she isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

OriqMask.name: Oriq Mask
OriqMask.description: Y'demi wears an Oriq mask. While wearing the mask, Y'demi can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors, and she adds double her proficiency bonus to Charisma (Deception) checks (included above).

SanguineSense.name: Sanguine Sense
SanguineSense.description: While Y'demi isn't blinded, she can see any creature that isn't an Undead or a Construct within 60 feet of itself, even through Cover||3||total cover, heavily obscured areas, invisibility, or any other phenomena that would prevent sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Y'demi makes two Blood Lash attacks.

BloodLash.name: BloodLash
BloodLash.description: ms 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the Y'demi's next turn.

BloodBoil{@recharge4}.name: BloodBoil{@recharge4}
BloodBoil{@recharge4}.description: Y'demi chooses a point within 150 feet of itself, and a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point fills with a burst of searing, blood-red mist. Each creature of Y'demi's choice that she can see in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) necrotic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated. A creature dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this necrotic damage.

DiveAttack.name: Dive Attack
DiveAttack.description: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

Simulacra.name: Simulacra
Simulacra.description: When a simulacrum drops to 0 hit points or is subjected to a successful dispel magic spell (DC 17), it reverts to ice and snow and is destroyed.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SummonAirElemental.name: SummonAirElemental
SummonAirElemental.description: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an air elemental. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The decapus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tentacles.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature grappled by the decapus. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (9d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage or 14 (5d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage if the decapus is grappling a creature other than the target or if the decapus is on the ground or floor. The target is also grappled (escape DC 14) unless the decapus is already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

BoulderGuise.name: Boulder Guise
BoulderGuise.description: While fully withdrawn into its shell, the geonid can't see and is indistinguishable from a small boulder

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

StoneTell.name: StoneTell
StoneTell.description: The geonid touches a stone object or surface and knows what types of creatures have been within 10 feet of that stone in the past 24 hours. The geonid can also determine the number of creatures of each type, but not their identities.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The slug has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The slug can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The slug makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The topi has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the topi to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the topi drops to 1 hit point instead.

VenomousClaws.name: VenomousClaws
VenomousClaws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the target's next turn.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If Vecna fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Vecna carries a magic dagger named Afterthought. In the hands of anyone other than Vecna, Afterthought is a +2 Dagger.

Undying.name: Undying
Undying.description: If Vecna is slain, his soul refuses to accept its fate and lives on as a disembodied spirit that fashions a new body for itself after 1d100 years. Vecna's new body appears within 100 miles of where he was slain. When the new body is complete, Vecna regains all his hit points and becomes active again.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Vecna uses Flight of the Damned (if available), Rotten Fate, or Spellcasting. He then makes two attacks with Afterthought.

Afterthought.name: Afterthought
Afterthought.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is afflicted by entropic magic, taking 9 (2d8) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. Immediately after taking this damage on its turn, the target must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Until it succeeds on this save, the afflicted target can't regain hit points.

FlightoftheDamned{@recharge5}.name: FlightoftheDamned{@recharge5}
FlightoftheDamned{@recharge5}.description: Vecna conjures a torrent of flying, spectral entities that fill a 120-foot cone and pass through all creatures in that area before dissipating. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage and has the frightened condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

RottenFate.name: RottenFate
RottenFate.description: Vecna causes necrotic magic to engulf one creature he can see within 120 feet of himself. The target must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw, taking 96 (8d8 + 60) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A Humanoid killed by this magic rises as a zombie at the start of Vecna's next turn and acts immediately after Vecna in the initiative order. The zombie is under Vecna's control.

EaroftheChosen.name: Ear of the Chosen
EaroftheChosen.description: Whenever a creature on the same plane of existence as Alustriel speaks Alustriel's name, Alustriel hears her name and the next nine words the speaker utters.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Alustriel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Alustriel carries a magic staff known as the Staff of Silverymoon. In the hands of anyone other than Alustriel, the Staff of Silverymoon is a Staff of Power.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Alustriel makes three Staff of Silverymoon attacks or two Reproving Ray attacks.

StaffofSilverymoon.name: StaffofSilverymoon
StaffofSilverymoon.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 38 (7d10) radiant damage.

ReprovingRay.name: ReprovingRay
ReprovingRay.description: rs 14 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 65 (9d12 + 7) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must make a DC 22 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the incapacitated condition until the start of Alustriel's next turn. On a successful save, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of Alustriel's next turn.

ArgentBlaze(RequiresSilverFire).name: ArgentBlaze(RequiresSilverFire)
ArgentBlaze(RequiresSilverFire).description: Alustriel summons a 60-foot cone of silver fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 77 (14d10) radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, Alustriel or one creature of her choice within 60 feet of her then regains 10 (3d6) hit points.

ArcaneWard.name: Arcane Ward
ArcaneWard.description: The abjurer has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever the abjurer takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the abjurer takes any remaining damage. When the abjurer casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The guard drake can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

PodlingLink.name: Podling Link
PodlingLink.description: The plant can see through and communicate telepathically with any of its podlings within 10 miles of it.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When the plant dies, it returns to life in the place where it died 1d12 months later, unless the ground where it took root is sown with salt or soaked with poison.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The plant doesn't require sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The plant makes three Vine Lash attacks.

VineLash.name: VineLash
VineLash.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained. The plant has four vines, each of which can grapple one target.

EntrappingPod.name: EntrappingPod
EntrappingPod.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature grappled by the plant. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) acid damage, and the target is pulled into the plant's space and enveloped by the pod, and the grapple ends. While enveloped, the target is restrained, and it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and effects originating outside the pod. The enveloped target must also immediately succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned by the plant's sapping enzymes until it is removed from the pod or the plant dies. The enveloped target doesn't require air and gains 1 level of exhaustion for each hour it spends in the pod. If the target dies while enveloped, it immediately emerges from the pod as a living podling, wearing or carrying all of the original creature's equipment.

Compression.name: Compression
Compression.description: The boneless can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing. It can also squeeze to fit into a space that a Tiny creature could fit in.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The boneless doesn't require sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The boneless makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Large or smaller creature, the creature is grappled (escape DC 13), and the boneless can use Crushing Embrace.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

CrushingEmbrace.name: CrushingEmbrace
CrushingEmbrace.description: The boneless wraps its body around a Large or smaller creature grappled by it. While the boneless is attached, the target is blinded and is unable to breathe. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw at the start of each of the boneless' turns or take 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If something moves the target, the boneless moves with it. The boneless can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can use its action to try to detach the boneless and force it to move into the nearest unoccupied space, doing so with a successful DC 13 Strength check. When the boneless dies, it detaches from any creature it is attached to.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The carrion stalker makes three Tentacle attacks. If it is attached to a creature, it can replace one Tentacle attack with Larval Burst, if available.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the carrion stalker attaches to the target and pulls itself into the target's space. While attached, the carrion stalker moves with the target and has advantage on attack rolls against it.

LarvalBurst(1/Day).name: LarvalBurst(1/Day)
LarvalBurst(1/Day).description: The carrion stalker releases a burst of larvae in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. A creature poisoned in this way takes 7 (2d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns as larvae infest its body. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Any effect that cures disease or removes the poisoned condition instantly kills the larvae in the creature, ending the effect on it.

FalseObject.name: False Object
FalseObject.description: If the carrionette is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the carrionette move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the carrionette is animate.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The carrionette doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

SilverNeedle.name: SilverNeedle
SilverNeedle.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 1 piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed for 1 minute. While cursed in this way, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet, and it must roll a 1d4 and subtract the number rolled from each ability check or attack roll it makes.

SoulSwap.name: SoulSwap
SoulSwap.description: The carrionette targets a creature it can see within 15 feet of it that is cursed by its Silver Needle. Unless the target is protected by a protection from evil and good spell, it must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have its consciousness swapped with the carrionette. The carrionette gains control of the target's body, and the target is unconscious for 1 hour, after which it gains control of the carrionette's body. While controlling the target's body, the carrionette retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. It otherwise uses the controlled body's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

BeheadedForm.name: Beheaded Form
BeheadedForm.description: When created, a death's head takes one of three forms: Aberrant Head, Gnashing Head, or Petrifying Head. This form determines the creature's attack.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The death's head doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

GnashingBite(GnashingHeadOnly).name: GnashingBite(GnashingHeadOnly)
GnashingBite(GnashingHeadOnly).description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

Mind-BendingBite(AberrantHeadOnly).name: Mind-BendingBite(AberrantHeadOnly)
Mind-BendingBite(AberrantHeadOnly).description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Intelligence saving throw or it can't take a reaction until the end of its next turn. Moreover, on its next turn, the target must choose whether it gets a move, an action, or a bonus action; it gets only one of the three.

PetrifyingBite(PetrifyingHeadOnly).name: PetrifyingBite(PetrifyingHeadOnly)
PetrifyingBite(PetrifyingHeadOnly).description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the target is petrified for 10 minutes.

HeadlessSummoning(RechargesafteraShortor.name: Headless Summoning (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
HeadlessSummoning(RechargesafteraShortor.description: If the dullahan is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, it regains 97 hit points. In addition, it summons three death's head|VRGR|death's heads, one of each type, in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of it. The death's heads are under the dullahan's control and act immediately after the dullahan in the initiative order. Additionally, the dullahan can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section. Award a party an additional 5,900 XP (11,800 XP total) for defeating the dullahan after it uses Headless Summoning.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the dullahan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dullahan doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dullahan makes two attacks.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. If the dullahan scores a critical hit against a creature, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or the dullahan cuts off the target's head. The target dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature that doesn't have or need a head, or has legendary actions, instead takes an extra 27 (6d8) slashing damage.

FierySkull.name: FierySkull
FierySkull.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) fire damage.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: Elise is immune to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever Elise is subjected to lightning damage, she takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Elise has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Elise's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Elise makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

DivinationSenses.name: Divination Senses
DivinationSenses.description: The gallows speaker can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The gallows speaker can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends it turn inside an object.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The gallows speaker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

ForetellingTouch.name: ForetellingTouch
ForetellingTouch.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage, and the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the next attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of the gallows speaker's next turn.

SufferingEchoes.name: SufferingEchoes
SufferingEchoes.description: The gallows speaker targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage, and waves of painful memories leap from the target to up to three other creatures of the gallows speaker's choice that are within 30 feet of the target, each of which takes 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the emissary fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The emissary doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The emissary makes three attacks.

LashingMaw.name: LashingMaw
LashingMaw.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) acid damage.

PsychicOrb.name: PsychicOrb
PsychicOrb.description: rs 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) psychic damage.

UnearthlyBile{@recharge5}.name: UnearthlyBile{@recharge5}
UnearthlyBile{@recharge5}.description: The emissary expels bile that splashes all creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of the emissary. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. For each creature that fails the saving throw, a gibbering mouther (see its entry in the Monster Manual) appears in an unoccupied space on a surface that can support it within 30 feet of that creature. The gibbering mouthers act right after the emissary on the same initiative count, gaining a +7 bonus to their attack and damage rolls, and fighting until they are destroyed. They disappear when the emissary dies.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The inquisitor attacks twice with its Silver Longsword or uses Mind Fire twice.

SilverLongsword.name: SilverLongsword
SilverLongsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) force damage.

MindFire.name: MindFire
MindFire.description: The inquisitor targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 17 (3d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of the inquisitor's next turn.

Inquisitor'sCommand{@recharge5}.name: Inquisitor'sCommand{@recharge5}
Inquisitor'sCommand{@recharge5}.description: Each creature of the inquisitor's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the start of the inquisitor's next turn. On the charmed target's turn, the inquisitor can telepathically control the target's move, action, or both. When controlled in this way, the target can take only the Attack (inquisitor chooses the target) or Dash action.

MetabolicControl.name: Metabolic Control
MetabolicControl.description: At the start of each of its turns, the inquisitor regains 10 hit points and can end one condition on itself, provided the inquisitor has at least 1 hit point.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The inquisitor attacks twice with its Silver Longsword. After it hits or misses with an attack, the inquisitor can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

SilverLongsword.name: SilverLongsword
SilverLongsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The inquisitor attacks twice.

ForceBolt.name: ForceBolt
ForceBolt.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the inquisitor can push it up to 10 feet away.

SilverLongsword.name: SilverLongsword
SilverLongsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) force damage.

Implode{@recharge4}.name: Implode{@recharge4}
Implode{@recharge4}.description: Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the inquisitor can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 31 (6d8 + 4) force damage and be knocked prone and moved to the unoccupied space closest to the sphere's center. Large and smaller objects that aren't being worn or carried in the sphere automatically take the damage and are similarly moved.

FiendishBlessing.name: Fiendish Blessing
FiendishBlessing.description: The AC of Isolde includes her Charisma bonus.

MagicResistanceAura.name: Magic Resistance Aura
MagicResistanceAura.description: While holding Nepenthe|VRGR, Isolde creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around her. While this aura is active, Isolde and all creatures friendly to her in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Isolde makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

Nepenthe.name: Nepenthe
Nepenthe.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft.., one target. on hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) slashing damage, or 12 (1d10 + 7) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a fiend or an undead, it takes an extra 11 (2d10) radiant damage.

FireRay.name: FireRay
FireRay.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.

FiendishCharm.name: FiendishCharm
FiendishCharm.description: One humanoid Isolde can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys Isolde's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from Isolde or another creature or receives a suicidal command from Isolde, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Isolde's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

JiangshiWeaknesses.name: Jiangshi Weaknesses
JiangshiWeaknesses.description: The jiangshi has the following flaws:

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The jiangshi doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The jiangshi makes three Slam attacks and uses Consume Energy.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

ConsumeEnergy.name: ConsumeEnergy
ConsumeEnergy.description: The jiangshi draws energy from a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target makes a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The jiangshi regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. After regaining hit points from this action, the jiangshi gains the following benefits for 7 days: its walking speed increases to 40 feet, and it gains a flying speed equal to its walking speed and can hover.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The jiangshi polymorphs into a Beast, a Humanoid, or an Undead that is Medium or Small or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the jiangshi's choice). It reverts to its true form if it dies.

AberrantRejuvenation.name: Aberrant Rejuvenation
AberrantRejuvenation.description: When the emissary drops to 0 hit points, its body melts away. A greater star spawn emissary instantly appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where the lesser emissary disappeared. The greater emissary uses the lesser emissary's initiative count.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the emissary fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The emissary doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The emissary makes three attacks.

LashingMaw.name: LashingMaw
LashingMaw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) acid damage.

PsychicOrb.name: PsychicOrb
PsychicOrb.description: rs 13 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) psychic damage.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The emissary polymorphs into a Small or Medium creature of its choice or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The loup garou has advantage on attack rolls against a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: When the loup garou fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The loup garou regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the loup garou takes damage from a silver weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of the loup garou's next turn. The loup garou dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The loup garou makes two attacks: two with its Longsword (humanoid form) or one with its Bite and one with its Claws (dire wolf or hybrid form).

Bite(DireWolforHybridFormOnly).name: Bite(DireWolforHybridFormOnly)

value.value: Bite (Dire Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)

Bite(DireWolforHybridFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with loup garou lycanthropy.

Claws(DireWolforHybridFormOnly).name: Claws(DireWolforHybridFormOnly)

value.value: Claws (Dire Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)

Claws(DireWolforHybridFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Longsword(HumanoidFormOnly).name: Longsword(HumanoidFormOnly)
Longsword(HumanoidFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

value.condition: (40 ft. in hybrid form, 50 ft. in dire wolf form)

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the necrichor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: Unless its lifeless remains are splashed with holy water or placed in a vessel under the effects of the hallow spell, the destroyed necrichor re-forms in 1d10 days, regaining all its hits points and appearing in the place it died or in the nearest unoccupied space.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The necrichor can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The necrichor doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The necrichor makes two attacks.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of the necrichor's next turn.

NecroticBolt.name: NecroticBolt
NecroticBolt.description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the necrichor's next turn.

BloodPuppeteering{@recharge}.name: BloodPuppeteering{@recharge}
BloodPuppeteering{@recharge}.description: The necrichor targets a creature it can see within 5 feet of it that is missing any of its hit points. If the target isn't a Construct or an Undead, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or the necrichor enters the target's space and attaches itself to the target for 1 minute. While attached, the necrichor takes only half damage dealt to it (round down), and the target takes the remaining damage. The necrichor can attach to only one creature at a time.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The nosferatu regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the nosferatu takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the start of the nosferatu's next turn.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The nosferatu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: The nosferatu takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The nosferatu doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nosferatu makes two Claw attacks followed by one Bite attack. If both Claw attacks hit the same creature, the Bite attack is made with advantage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

BloodDisgorge{@recharge5}.name: BloodDisgorge{@recharge5}
BloodDisgorge{@recharge5}.description: The nosferatu vomits blood in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

SemblanceofLife.name: Semblance of Life
SemblanceofLife.description: The podling is a physical copy of a creature digested by a bodytaker plant. The podling has the digested creature's memories and behaves like that creature, but with occasional lapses. An observer familiar with the digested creature can recognize the discrepancies with a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Insight) check, or automatically if the podling does something in direct contradiction to the digested creature's established beliefs or behavior. The podling melts into a slurry when it dies, when the bodytaker plant that created it dies, or when the bodytaker plant dismisses it (no action required).

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The podling doesn't require sleep.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

TattooofOsybus.name: Tattoo of Osybus
TattooofOsybus.description: If the priest drops to 0 hit points, roll on the Boons of Undeath table for the boon the priest receives. The priest dies if it receives a boon it already has. If it receives a new boon, it revives at the start of its next turn with half its hit points restored, and its creature type is now Undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The priest attacks twice.

SoulBlade.name: SoulBlade
SoulBlade.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is paralyzed until the start of the priest's next turn. If this damage reduces a Medium or smaller creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies, and its soul is trapped in the priest's body, manifesting as a shadowy Soul Tattoo on the priest. The soul is freed if the priest dies.

NecroticBolt.name: NecroticBolt
NecroticBolt.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the priest's next turn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the juggernaut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The juggernaut regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the juggernaut takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The juggernaut dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The juggernaut doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The juggernaut makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with Deadly Shaping if it is ready.

Executioner'sPick.name: Executioner'sPick
Executioner'sPick.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the juggernaut's next turn.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

DeadlyShaping{@recharge5}.name: DeadlyShaping{@recharge5}
DeadlyShaping{@recharge5}.description: The juggernaut magically shapes a feature of its surroundings into a deadly implement. A creature the juggernaut can see within 60 feet of it must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. If the saving throw fails, the targeted creature is struck by one of the following (juggernaut's choice):

FlyingStone.name: FlyingStone
FlyingStone.description: The target takes 22 (5d8) bludgeoning damage and is incapacitated until the start of the juggernaut's next turn, and the implement vanishes.

ScythingShrapnel.name: ScythingShrapnel
ScythingShrapnel.description: The target takes 14 (4d6) slashing damage, and the implement vanishes. At the start of each of its turns, the target takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage from the wound left by the shrapnel. The wound ends if the target regains any hit points or if a creature uses an action to stanch the wound, which requires a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Medicine) check.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If the slasher fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

ShroudedPresence.name: Shrouded Presence
ShroudedPresence.description: The slasher is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, and it can't be detected by abilities that sense Fiends.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The slasher makes two Slasher's Knife attacks.

Slasher'sKnife.name: Slasher'sKnife
Slasher'sKnife.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it suffers a lingering wound that causes it to take 7 (2d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. Each time the slasher hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 3 (1d6). The wound ends if the target regains hit points or if a creature uses an action to stanch the wound, which requires a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Medicine) check.

StirgeTelepathy.name: Stirge Telepathy
StirgeTelepathy.description: The strigoi can magically command any stirge within 120 feet of it, using a limited form of telepathy.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The strigoi makes one Claw attack and makes one Proboscis attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 6 (1d12) acid damage.

Proboscis.name: Proboscis
Proboscis.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the strigoi regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and leaves nothing behind except its skin and its equipment.

RavenousChildren(1/Day).name: RavenousChildren(1/Day)
RavenousChildren(1/Day).description: The strigoi magically summons 1d4 + 2 stirge||stirges (see their entry in the Monster Manual) in unoccupied spaces it can see within 30 feet of it. The stirges are under the strigoi's control and act immediately after the strigoi in the initiative order. The stirges disappear after 1 hour, when the strigoi dies, or when the strigoi dismisses them (no action required).

LimitedSpellImmunity.name: Limited Spell Immunity
LimitedSpellImmunity.description: The swarm automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 3rd level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny gremishka. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Infestation.name: Infestation
Infestation.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. A creature damaged by the swarm must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny scarab. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Skeletonize.name: Skeletonize
Skeletonize.description: If the swarm starts its turn in the same space as a dead creature that is Large or smaller, the corpse is destroyed, leaving behind only equipment and bones (or exoskeleton).

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

RavenousBites.name: RavenousBites
RavenousBites.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. If the target is a creature, scarabs burrow into its body, and the creature takes 3 (1d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. Any creature can use an action to kill or remove the scarabs with fire or a weapon that deals piercing damage, causing 1 damage of the appropriate type to the target. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the swarm's piercing damage dies.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny limb. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The swarm makes one Undead Mass attack and one Grasping Limbs attack.

UndeadMass.name: UndeadMass
UndeadMass.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

GraspingLimbs.name: GraspingLimbs
GraspingLimbs.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. on hit: 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be restrained. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 7 (2d6) necrotic damage on a failed save. The creature is freed if it succeeds on this saving throw, the swarm moves out of the creature's space, or the swarm dies.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Agdon is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if he fails, provided he isn't incapacitated.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: Agdon's long jump is up to 20 feet and his high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Agdon makes two Branding Iron or Dagger attacks.

BrandingIron.name: BrandingIron
BrandingIron.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage, and the target is magically branded. Agdon is invisible to creatures branded in this way. The brand disappears after 24 hours, or it can be removed from a creature or object by any spell that ends a curse.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Alagarthas has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Alagarthas has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Alagarthas makes two melee attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.

Leadership(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Leadership(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Leadership(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: For 1 minute, Alagarthas can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand him. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Alagarthas is incapacitated.

SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.description: Amidor can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if it shared a language with them.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

SeedSling.name: SeedSling
SeedSling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Bavlorna can breathe air and water.

BoonofImmortality.name: Boon of Immortality
BoonofImmortality.description: Bavlorna is immune to any effect that would age her, and she can't die from old age.

WiddershinsAllergy.name: Widdershins Allergy
WiddershinsAllergy.description: If a creature within 10 feet of Bavlorna uses at least 10 feet of movement to run in place counterclockwise, Bavlorna is overcome by a fit of sneezing and can't cast spells until the end of her next turn. In addition, any creature Bavlorna has swallowed is immediately expelled and falls prone in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of her.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Bavlorna makes one Bite attack and one Withering Ray attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Bavlorna can't use her Bite attack on another target.

WitheringRay.name: WitheringRay
WitheringRay.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

CreateLornlings{@recharge5}.name: CreateLornlings{@recharge5}
CreateLornlings{@recharge5}.description: Bavlorna creates one or two 1-foot-tall duplicates of herself, called lornlings (use the Quickling stat block in appendix C). Each lornling appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of Bavlorna, obeys her commands, and takes its turn immediately after hers. A lornling lasts for 1 hour, until it or Bavlorna dies, or until Bavlorna dismisses it as an action. Bavlorna can have no more than eight lornlings in existence at a time.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The brigganock has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

SoulLight.name: Soul Light
SoulLight.description: The brigganock is accompanied by an insubstantial, invulnerable ball of light that contains its soul. The brigganock can't turn off the light or control its brightness. The soul light sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. If the brigganock dies, its soul light fades away.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: Using a pickaxe or similar tool, a brigganock can burrow through solid rock at a speed of 5 feet, leaving a 6-inch-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
Pickaxe.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

TimeLapse(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.name: TimeLapse(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Time Lapse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

TimeLapse(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.description: The brigganock accelerates the passage of time around itself, enabling it to accomplish up to 1 hour of work in a matter of seconds. This work can't affect any creature other than the brigganock, or any object being worn or carried by another creature, and the activity must take place within a 10-foot cube. For example, the brigganock could use this action to rapidly carve a pumpkin, cook and eat dinner, move a pile of stones, or tie a dozen knots in a length of rope.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The knight can breathe air and water.

SpeakwithFrogsandToads.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
SpeakwithFrogsandToads.description: The knight can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The knight's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The knight makes two Glaive attacks.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The campestri can mimic any voice or song it has heard, albeit in a nasal falsetto.

HeadButt.name: HeadButt
HeadButt.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

Spores(1/Day).name: Spores(1/Day)
Spores(1/Day).description: A 5-foot radius of spores extends from the campestri. These spores can go around corners, and they have no effect on Constructs, Elementals, Plants, or Undead. Each other creature in the area must make a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is incapacitated and its speed is halved, both for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Clapperclaw doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Stuffing.name: Stuffing
Stuffing.description: Clapperclaw stuffs straw or other dead plant matter into itself and regains 2d4 + 2 hit points. Roll a d6; on a 1 or 2, Clapperclaw runs out of stuffing and must spend 8 hours foraging for more before it can use this action again.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Ahmaergo has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

Indomitable(2/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(2/Day).description: Ahmaergo can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: As a bonus action, Ahmaergo can regain 20 hit points.

ExtraDamage.name: Extra Damage
ExtraDamage.description: If Ahmaergo has more than half his hit points remaining he deals an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage on every hit.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ahmaergo makes three attacks with his greataxe.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aarakocra makes two Wind Staff attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast Gust of Wind|XPHB.

WindStaff.name: WindStaff
WindStaff.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage, or 9 (3d4 + 2) Slashing damage if the aarakocra moved 30+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

WindJavelin.name: WindJavelin
WindJavelin.description: m,r 4, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Thunder damage. {@hom}The javelin magically returns to the aarakocra's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cultist makes two Tentacle Lash attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Mind Rot.

TentacleLash.name: TentacleLash
TentacleLash.description: m 7, reach 10 ft. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Psychic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 14) from one of two tentacles, and it has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the grapple ends.

MindRot.name: MindRot
MindRot.description: wis DC 15, one creature the cultist can see within 90 feet. {@actSaveFail} 27 (6d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the cultist's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

AnimalLordship.name: Animal Lordship
AnimalLordship.description: An animal lord represents a Forager, Hunter, or Sage (DM's choice), which determines certain traits in this stat block.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the animal lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

LordlyPresence.name: Lordly Presence
LordlyPresence.description: wis DC 20, any enemy that starts its turn in a 30-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the animal lord. {@actSaveFail} The target suffers one of the following effects:

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The animal lord has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Rend.description: m 13, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

RadiantRay.name: RadiantRay
RadiantRay.description: r 12, range 120 ft. on hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) Radiant damage.

AnimalSpirit.name: AnimalSpirit
AnimalSpirit.description: The animal lord conjures an animal spirit that strikes at a creature and then disappears. dex DC 20, one creature the animal lord can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 28 (4d10 + 6) Radiant damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} One of the following effects occurs:

Slash.name: Slash
Slash.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage.

Smother.name: Smother
Smother.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the rug can give it the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 13) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded|XPHB and Restrained|XPHB conditions, is suffocating, and takes 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The rug can smother only one creature at a time.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day,or5/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(4/Day,or5/DayinLair).description: If the hag fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hag has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpitefulEscape.name: Spiteful Escape
SpitefulEscape.description: When the hag drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB, it dies only if it is within 30 feet of its anathema (a thing the DM chooses as the hag's most hated thing). Otherwise, the hag drops to 1 Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point and teleports to a harmless demiplane, and it can't return to the plane it left for 2d6 days. When the hag teleports away, each creature within 60 feet of the space it left is cursed. Until the curse ends, a creature has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and saving throws, and the hag knows its location anywhere in the multiverse.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hag makes two Spectral Claw attacks and uses Crackling Wave.

SpectralClaw.name: SpectralClaw
SpectralClaw.description: m,r 14, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) Force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

CracklingWave.name: CracklingWave
CracklingWave.description: dex DC 22, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 32 (5d12) Lightning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The target is cursed until the end of the hag's next turn. The target can't take Reactions until the curse ends.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The archelon can breathe air and water.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

HolyWord{@recharge4}.description: wis DC 17, each enemy in a 20-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the archpriest. {@actSaveFail} 21 (6d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the Stunned|XPHB condition until the end of the archpriest's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

FireAura.name: Fire Aura
FireAura.description: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the azer takes 11 (2d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The azer sheds Bright Light|XPHB in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 10 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The azer makes two Flame Burst attacks.

FlameBurst.name: FlameBurst
FlameBurst.description: m,r 7, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Fire damage.

FireAura.name: Fire Aura
FireAura.description: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the azer takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The azer sheds Bright Light|XPHB in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 10 feet.

BurningHammer.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

Evasion.description: If the bandit is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the bandit instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.
