Multiattack.description: The bandit makes three attacks, using Scimitar or Pistol in any combination.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description: r 9, range 30/90 ft. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bandit makes three Dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: m,r 6, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

BlindingFlash{@recharge4}.name: BlindingFlash{@recharge4}
BlindingFlash{@recharge4}.description: con DC 14, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on a point the bandit can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 13 (3d6 + 3) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded|XPHB condition until the start of the bandit's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

BloodiedFrenzy.name: Bloodied Frenzy
BloodiedFrenzy.description: While Bloodied|XPHB, the berserker has Advantage|XPHB on attack rolls and saving throws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The berserker makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Javelin in any combination.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage, plus 10 (3d6) Thunder damage to the target or another creature within 5 feet of the target.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: m,r 7, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB decreases by 5 feet until the start of the berserker's next turn.

AstralImplosion.name: Astral Implosion
AstralImplosion.description: If the blob is reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea. The blob itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it. In 1d20 years, the blob reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the blob fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The blob has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blob makes two Pseudopod attacks and uses Engulf. It can replace one attack with a use of Restraining Glob.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: m 15, reach 30 ft. on hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) Force damage.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description: The blob moves up to its Speed|XPHB and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects. str DC 23, each creature or object whose space the blob enters for the first time during this move. {@actSaveFail} The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has Cover|XPHB|Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the blob, and when the blob moves, the engulfed target moves with it. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed.

RestrainingGlob.name: RestrainingGlob
RestrainingGlob.description: The blob lobs a slimy glob at one Large or smaller creature it can see within 600 feet of itself. dex DC 23, the targeted creature. {@actSaveFail} 18 (3d6 + 8) Acid damage. The glob rolls the target 60 feet straight toward the blob, and the target has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn, when the glob harmlessly dissolves. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The naga makes two Bite attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Serpentine Gaze.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 10 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

SerpentineGaze.name: SerpentineGaze
SerpentineGaze.description: wis DC 13, one creature the naga can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 13 (3d6 + 3) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed|XPHB condition until the start of the naga's next turn.

FlameAura.name: Flame Aura
FlameAura.description: At the end of each of the gorgon's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the gorgon takes 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The gorgon sheds Bright Light|XPHB in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 10 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gorgon makes two Gore attacks.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: m 8, reach 5 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

SmeltingCharge{@recharge5}.name: SmeltingCharge{@recharge5}
SmeltingCharge{@recharge5}.description: The gorgon moves up to its Speed|XPHB without provoking Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks and can move through the spaces of Medium or smaller creatures. Each time the gorgon enters a creature's space for the first time during this move, that target is subjected to the following effect. dex DC 16. {@actSaveFail} 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) Fire damage, and the target is pulled into the gorgon's space and has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape 14); if the gorgon already has a creature Grappled|XPHB, the target has the Prone|XPHB condition instead. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained|XPHB condition. When the gorgon moves, the Grappled|XPHB target moves with it, costing no extra movement.

Abduct.name: Abduct
Abduct.description: The bugbear needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bugbear makes two Javelin or Morningstar attacks.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: m,r 5, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: m 5 (with Advantage|XPHB if the target is Grappled|XPHB by the bugbear), reach 10 ft. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

Abduct.name: Abduct
Abduct.description: The bugbear needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

Grab.name: Grab
Grab.description: m 4, reach 10 ft. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 12).

LightHammer.name: LightHammer
LightHammer.description: m,r 4 (with Advantage|XPHB if the target is Grappled|XPHB by the bugbear), reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 9 (3d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

Amphibious.description: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

SpeakwithFrogsandToads.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
SpeakwithFrogsandToads.description: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

InsectileRapier.name: InsectileRapier

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Pike.name: Pike
Pike.description: m 6, reach 10 ft. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: r 4, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

ForestStaff.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

SunRay.description: r 7, range 90 ft. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded|XPHB condition until the start of the centaur's next turn.

Multiattack.description: The cockatrice makes one Petrifying Bite attack and two Talons attacks.

PetrifyingBite.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. con DC 14. 1 The target has the Restrained|XPHB condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained|XPHB, ending the effect on itself on a success. 2 The target has the Petrified|XPHB condition instead of the Restrained|XPHB condition.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The colossus has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The colossus makes three attacks, using Slam or Radiant Ray in any combination.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: m 18, reach 20 ft. on hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) Bludgeoning damage, and the colossus pushes the target up to 20 feet straight away from itself.

RadiantRay.name: RadiantRay
RadiantRay.description: r 18, range 300 ft. on hit: 22 (4d10) Radiant damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

DivineBeam{@recharge5}.name: DivineBeam{@recharge5}
DivineBeam{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 26, each creature in a 300-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line. {@actSaveFail} 65 (10d12) Radiant damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB by this beam disintegrates into dust, leaving behind any magic items it was wearing or carrying.

PactBlade.name: PactBlade

PactBlade.name: PactBlade
PactBlade.description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

RadiantRay.name: RadiantRay
RadiantRay.description: r 9, range 120 ft. on hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) Radiant damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

RadiantStrike.name: RadiantStrike
RadiantStrike.description: m 10, reach 10 ft. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Radiant damage.

StoneClub.name: StoneClub
StoneClub.description: m 9, reach 10 ft. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: r 9, range 30/120 ft. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cultist makes three attacks, using Dread Scythe or Deathly Ray in any combination.

DreadScythe.name: DreadScythe
DreadScythe.description: m 7, reach 10 ft. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Necrotic damage, and the target can't regain Hit Points|XPHB until the end of its next turn.

DeathlyRay.name: DeathlyRay
DeathlyRay.description: r 6, range 120 ft. on hit: 22 (4d10) Necrotic damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The aspirant has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MarshalUndead.name: Marshal Undead
MarshalUndead.description: Undead creatures of the aspirant's choice (excluding itself) in a 60-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from it have Advantage|XPHB on attack rolls and saving throws. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aspirant makes three Dread Blade attacks.

DreadBlade.name: DreadBlade
DreadBlade.description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage.

HellfireOrb{@recharge5}.name: HellfireOrb{@recharge5}
HellfireOrb{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on a point the aspirant can see within 120 feet of itself. {@actSaveFail} 21 (6d6) Fire damage plus 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The worg has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The worg makes three Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 10, reach 5 ft. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the worg's next turn. While Poisoned|XPHB, the target can't regain Hit Points|XPHB.

DreadfulHowl{@recharge5}.name: DreadfulHowl{@recharge5}
DreadfulHowl{@recharge5}.description: wis DC 16, each creature within 30 feet that isn't a worg. {@actSaveFail} 36 (8d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the start of the worg's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

LifeSuppression.name: Life Suppression
LifeSuppression.description: Creatures within 60 feet of the dracolich can't regain Hit Points|XPHB.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dracolich has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SoulGem.name: Soul Gem
SoulGem.description: The dracolich has a magical gem. If the dracolich is destroyed while the gem is on the same plane of existence as it, the dracolich gains a new body in 1d20 days, regaining all its Hit Points|XPHB and appearing within 5 feet of the gem.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dracolich makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Ray of Sickness|XPHB (level 2 version).

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 13, reach 10 ft. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

NecroticBreath{@recharge5}.name: NecroticBreath{@recharge5}
NecroticBreath{@recharge5}.description: con DC 20, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 52 (8d12) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

EarthGlide.name: Earth Glide
EarthGlide.description: The cataclysm can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the cataclysm doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the cataclysm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster

ElementalBurst.description: m,r 15, reach 30 ft. or range 150 ft. on hit: 25 (5d6 + 8) damage of a type chosen by the cataclysm: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

CataclysmicEvent{@recharge4}.name: CataclysmicEvent{@recharge4}
CataclysmicEvent{@recharge4}.description: The cataclysm creates one of the following effects at random (roll 1d4):

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cultist makes three attacks, using Elemental Flail or Elemental Claw in any combination.

ElementalFlail.name: ElementalFlail
ElementalFlail.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

ElementalClaw.name: ElementalClaw
ElementalClaw.description: r 7, range 120 ft. on hit: 22 (4d10) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the cultist moves the target up to 10 feet straight toward or away from itself.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The empyrean can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain|XPHB. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The empyrean has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

OtherworldlyStrike.name: OtherworldlyStrike

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dragon has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Bite.name: Bite
